Her business, which is sales of costume jewelry and accessories, is located in the center of Manta. Elba tells us that she started her business because of her brother, who had his own business. She admired how his business grew, bit by bit. The led her to make the decision that she, too, could have the same luck. Things are now going very well for her and she expects the business to grow. She has been tending her business from Monday through Sunday for 24 years. She doesn’t have an established schedule, but she never misses a day. With the loan she wants to continue expanding her merchandise, which will mean more growth for her business. Her dream is to grow as a small business owner through her business. Her goal is to one day own her own house.

loans.use: to buy costume jewelry and accessories.

loans.name: Alejandra Veronica

texts.es: Alejandra Verónica de veintiséis años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos; Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños, todo en variedad vestidos, faldas, pantalones, camisas, entre otros, su negocio está ubicado en un mercado cerca de la zona donde reside y tiene mucha clientela, las personas la prefieren porque siempre tiene lo que ellos necesitan con producto de calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es muy bueno, Alejandra se caracteriza por su gran amabilidad; es una mujer entregada al trabajo dispuesta a salir adelante, lo importante para ella es seguir sus sueños y alcanzar el éxito, ha aumentado la demanda de su producto y necesita invertir por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa por mayor. Alejandra Verónica es una mujer responsable con buenas referencias de pago, tiene la certeza que podrá pagar su deuda y a la vez podrá darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en: Alejandra Verónica is 26 and lives with her life companion and children.  She makes a living by selling women's, men's, and children's clothing of all varieties, such as dresses, skirts, pants, skirts, etc.  Her business is located in a market near the area where she lives, and she has many customers.  People prefer her because she always has what they need with a high-quality product and reasonable prices.  Her service is also very good.  Alejandra is characterized by her great friendliness.  She is a woman who is commited to her job so she can get ahead.  What is important to her is following her dreams and reaching success.  The demand for her products has increased, and she needs to invest, so she is requesting a loan from Integral that will let her buy clothing wholesale.  Alejandra Verónica is a responsible woman with good references.  She is certain that she will be able to pay her debt while at the same time giving her family a full life.

loans.use: to buy clothing wholesale: dresses, skirts, pants, shirts, etc.

loans.name: Elmer Oswaldo

texts.es: Elmer Oswaldo de treinta años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos, el posee una tienda donde vende productos de primera necesidad arroz, frijoles, huevos, bebidas, entre otros además posee un pequeño molino con el que complementa los gastos del hogar, lleva varios años con el negocio y está ubicado en un lugar muy estratégico tiene mucha clientela pues saben que todo lo que vende es de calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es excelente; Elmer es un hombre trabajador, le gusta aprovechar todas las oportunidades que se le presenta, quiere invertir para poder surtir la tienda pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, producto instantáneo, golosinas, bebidas, jabones etc. Elmer tiene experiencia crediticia y está seguro que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez ofrecerle a su familia un futuro más próspero.
texts.en:
Elmer Oswaldo is thirty years old and lives with his life companion and his childen. He has a shop where he sells essential items, amongst others rice, beans, eggs and drinks. He also has a small mill which helps him to meet the household expenses. He has had this business for a number of years and it is strategically located. He has many customers since they know that everything he sells is of good quality, sold at accessible prices and comes with excellent customer service. 

Elmer is a hard-working man who likes to take advantage of all the opportunities presented to him. He wants to invest in stocking the shop buy he needs money to do so. For this reason he is asking for a loan from INTEGRAL which will allow him to buy basic grains, instant products, sweets, drinks, soaps etc. Elmer has loan experience and is sure that he will be able to repay the debt and at the same time provide his family with a more prosperous future.

loans.use: basic grains, instant products, sweets, drinks, soaps.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: Juana de cincuenta y ocho años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus nietos en casa propia; ella se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras, tomates, cebollas, chiles, piña, papaya, entre otros, ya tiene varios años de dedicarse a este negocio se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues todo lo que vende es fresco de calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio e excelente; Juana es una mujer emprendedora, le gusta luchar por lo que desea,  está dispuesta a trabajar duro para llegar al éxito es por eso que se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar tomates, cebollas, chiles, papaya, guineos etc. Juana tiene capacidad crediticia y muy buena capacidad de pago, está  segura que podrá cancelar la deuda  y a la vez podrá darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en: Juana is fifty-eight years old and lives with her life partner and grandchildren in their house. She sells fruits and vegetables, such as tomatoes, onions, peppers, pineapple, and papaya among others. She has been in this business for many years and has a large customer base due to her sale of fresh quality products at accessible prices with excellent service. Juana is a driven woman who likes to strive for what she wants and is willing to work hard to be successful. She has asked Apoyo Integral [MFI] for a loan to buy tomatoes, onions, peppers, papaya, bananas, etc. Juana has creditworthiness and very good capacity for payments. She is confident in her ability to pay off the loan and give her family a fulfilling life.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, onions, peppers, papaya, and bananas.

loans.name: Eva

texts.en:
Eva is 42 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 7 children. 
Eva has a food/retail shop or sari-sari store that buys and sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products and beverages. She has had this business for 5 years. She requested a loan for 17,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks & beverages.
Eva has been a member of HSPFI since 2012. In the future, Eva hopes to improve her business in order to provide for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, soap, shampoo and beverages

loans.name: Raul

texts.en:
Raul is a farmer living in the mountainous region of Isabela . He is married and has five children. He has been involved in this business for over 15 years. He started farming on a quarter-acre farm and has seen his business grow through the purchase of land. Now he carries out the business on two acres of land. 

His crop farming is a profitable business due to the demand for corn and rice in local towns. He is applying for a loan of PHP 20,000 in order to purchase seeds and fertilizers.

Due to the periodic water shortages, Raul hopes to acquire a water pump to irrigate the land. He plans to achieve this by saving the additional profits obtained by this loan.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Maria Teresa

texts.es: María Teresa de treinta y nueve años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos; ella se dedica a la venta de cosméticos y ropa en variedad camisas, pantalones, vestidos, todo para damas, caballeros y niños, comercia de forma ambulante y desde su hogar,  es muy conocida en los lugares donde vende  y se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues saben que todo es de calidad y lo vende a precios accesibles además el servicio es excelente; María es una mujer dedicada a su labor dispuesta a salir adelante para alcanzar el éxito, quiere abarcar nuevas zonas para vender pero necesita invertir en mercadería por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa y cosméticos por mayor. María Teresa tiene capacidad crediticia y está segura que podrá cancelar el financiamiento y a la vez podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: 39-year-old María Teresa lives with her life partner and her children. She sells cosmetics and various garments, such as shirts, pants and dresses, all for women, men and children. She makes traveling sales and also sells from her home. She's very well-known in her sales areas, and she has gotten a lot of customers, because they know that everything is high quality and sold at accessible prices, and also the service is excellent. María is a woman who's dedicated to her work and willing to get ahead. In order to succeed, she wants to take on new sales areas, but she needs to stock up with merchandise. That's why she requests a loan from INTEGRAL, which will allow her to purchase clothing and cosmetics by wholesale. María Teresa has creditworthiness and she's certain that she'll be able to repay the loan, and at the same she'll be able to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase clothing and cosmetics by wholesale, such as makeup, lipstick, face cleansing lotion, etc.

loans.name: Luis Alfonso

texts.es: Luis Alfonso de cuarenta y dos años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos; él se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de maíz, ya tiene muchos años de dedicarse a este rubro y ha ganado mucha experiencia por lo que siempre obtiene las mejores cosechas, el terreno donde cultiva está ubicado en una zona de gran incidencia agrícola,  comercia en todos los alrededores de la zona y ya tiene mucha clientela pues  saben que todo lo que vende es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles; Luis es un hombre trabajador, honrado y sobre todo humilde, ama su labor y sabe que con esfuerzo podrá alcanzar el éxito, en el último tiempo de siembra tuvo mucha perdida por eso en esta temporada quiere recuperarse y aumentar la producción pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL  un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, fertilizante, herramienta, etc. Luis Alfonso tiene experiencia crediticia, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda en el tiempo establecido y a la vez ofrecerle a su familia un futuro más próspero.
texts.en: Luis Alfonso is 42 years old. He lives with his partner and their children. He works in agriculture; specifically, he cultivates corn. He has been in this business for many years and he has a lot of experience in it, which is why he always has very good harvests. The land where he plants is located in an area where there is a lot of agriculture. He sells in the surrounding areas and he has many customers because they know that everything he sells is top quality at a good price. Luis is a hardworking man, honorable, and above all, humble. He loves his work and knows that with hard work he will achieve success. During the last planting season, he had a lot of losses. So, this planting season he wants to recuperate what he lost and expand his production. However, he needs capital for this. This is why he is requesting a loan from Integral that will allow him to buy corn seed, fertilizer, and tools, etc. Luis Alfonso has experience with previous loans and assures that he will repay the loan in the established time frame. At the same time, he will be able to offer his family a more prosperous future.

loans.use: to buy corn seed, fertilizer, and tools.

loans.name: Juana Petrona

texts.es: Juana Petrona de cincuenta años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos; ella posee una taller de costura, donde confecciona todo tipo de prendas para damas, caballeros y niños, tiene muchos años de dedicarse a este negocio y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia, es muy conocida en la zona y se ha hecho de mucha clientela, elabora las mejores prendas con material de primera calidad y la vende a precios accesibles además el servicio es único, Juana siempre está a la orden de las personas que la visitan; Juana es una mujer emprendedora con muchas ganas de salir adelante, su meta  es luchar con esfuerzo y dedicación para alcanzar el éxito, quiere aumentar las ganancias de su negocio por eso invertirá para aumentar la producción y necesita de capital por eso le solicita a  INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar máquina, tela, hilos, agujas, etc. Juana Petrona es responsable con una moral intachable sabe con seguridad que saldara el financiamiento y a la vez podrá darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en: Juana Petrona is 50 and lives with her life companion and children.  She has a sewing shop, where she makes all types of garments for women, men, and children.  She has many years of experience with this business.  She is well-known in the area and has many customers.  She makes the best garments with high-quality materials and sells them at reasonable prices.  Her service is also extraordinary.  Juana is always at the service of people who visit her.  She is an enterprising woman with many desires of getting ahead.  Her goal is to fight with effort and dedication to reach success.  She wants to increase her profits.  This is why she will invest in her production, and she needs capital to do this.  She is requesting a loan from Integral that will let her buy a sewing machine, fabric, thread, needles, etc.  Juana Petrona is responsible with impeccable morals, and she is sure that she will pay off the loan while giving her family a full life.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine, fabric, thread, and needles.

loans.name: Melchor

texts.en:
Melchor, 41, is active and hardworking. He lives with his partner and children, to whom he gives love and all of his support to grow. 

His work is tilling the land and cultivating corn and rice plants, which are very profitable. He has done this work for ten years. Normally he works with the help of his wife Robelina, but during harvest time, he has the support of day laborers, who help him harvest the crops more quickly. In time he hopes to expand his land in order to cultivate more crops, so that he can earn more income. His priority now is increasing his rice production.

He is thankful for the financial support that he receives which lets him continue with his objectives. He is also glad to be a part of KIVA and ASKI because the members are responsible people. With the PHP 20,000 that he is requesting, he will purchase seedlings to plant in his fields.

loans.use: to purchase seedlings to plant in his fields

loans.name: Amour

texts.en:
Amour is 50 years old. He lives with Vilma, with whom he has three children. The family lives in a house that is rustic, but their own. It is located in a native community in Cabisera 2.

Amour is a farmer. He learned this activity when he was 20 years old. At his young age he had already worked on his parents' land. This is how he learned about the activity with which he now supports his family. He also does construction work such as bricklaying. 

In the two plots of land that he owns, Amour grows corn and rice, but now he wants to increase his production by outfitting another plot of land. He is hoping for financial help in order to plant corn and rice.

With the money he is now requesting, he will purchase corn, rice and bags of organic fertilizer in order to start planting in a field.

loans.use: to purchase corn, rice and bags of organic fertilizer in order to start planting in a field.

loans.name: Lauro

texts.en:
Lauro, 54, is married and has children. His wife is a homemaker and they live in the community of San Juan. For 20 years he has been growing crops. Lauro started the business on his own initiative since he learned the trade by going out to work during the corn and rice season. Upon seeing how profitable it was, Lauro decided to cultivate his own land. In general his work schedule is from 6:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m., but at harvest time this varies as work is abundant and he must take advantage of the time to harvest the crops. One of the problems he is up against is the changing climate, because as bad weather such as typhoons frequently strikes, he loses much of his crop. 

The loan being requested by Lauro is to buy fertilizers in order to improve his rice and corn plantation. The loan will help him increase production and income. One of his goals is to expand the farm and improve some technical aspects to increase his income and better support the family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers to improve his rice and corn.

loans.name: Bienvenido

texts.en:
Bienvenido, 48, is a hardworking man with three children living in the San Juan province of Isabela. His wants to educate his children and build a permanent house. 

Bienvenido has been a farmer for 10 years; he started with 8000 PHP of capital. Now he's requesting a loan of 20000 PHP to buy seeds, fertilizer and insecticides for his farm. His major hardships are high fuel and transportation costs, price fluctuations and inflation. His goal is to diversify his farm.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer and insecticide for his farm.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase corn by wholesale, clothing and cosmetics.

loans.name: Joaquin

texts.en: A very hardworking and loving father, Joaquin is a 48-year-old married man living with his wife and children. He started working as a farmer 15 years ago and specializes in cultivating rice. Some of his children are still attending school, and this is the reason he was obliged to do this job in order to pay for the hefty life expenses. Today, he is applying for a loan of PHP 15,000 to purchase seed and fertilizer for his farm. In the future, he plans to diversify his business operation and start cultivating different types of vegetables and fruits.

loans.use: to buy seed and fertilizer for his farm business

loans.name: Feliciano

texts.en: Feliciano is married and is a loving father of five children. He is a smart and goal-oriented person. He has been involved in farming activities for five years. Farming brings in a stable income, and this is why Feliciano continues this business and wants to expand it. He has another great wish, which is to see his children as educated people in the future. With this goal in mind, he works very hard day after day. Feliciano wants to obtain a loan in the sum of PHP 15,000 for the purchase of fertilizer and seed to grow. He hopes very much to get your support and help.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and seed to grow for his farm business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, shampoo and beverages

loans.name: Gustavo Enrique

texts.es: Gustavo Enrique de cuarenta y cinco años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos; Él se dedica al transporte de pasajeros en moto taxi y le ha dado buenos resultados tiene varios años de trabajar en este negocio, él se levanta desde muy temprano a empezar su labor, hace viajes por todas las zonas de la localidad donde reside, tiene muchos clientes las personas prefieren transportarse con Gustavo porque es una persona muy amable, conduce responsablemente y además les da un precio accesible; él es un hombre de familia, su lugar favorito cuando no trabaja es su casa porque comparte con su esposa e hijos, con el paso de los años su vivienda se ha deteriorado un poco, en especial el techo y en esta época de lluvias necesita repararlo pero necesita de capital es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar lamina, polines, pines, canaletas etc. Gustavo tiene buenas referencias crediticias y está seguro que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez darle a su familia la calidad de vida que se merece.
texts.en:
Gustavo Enrique, who is 45 years old, lives with his life companion and their children. His work is transporting passengers by motorcycle taxi, and it has given him good results. He has worked in this business for a number of years. He gets up very early and begins his work. He makes trips through all the zones of the area where he lives. He has many customers. People prefer to travel with Gustavo because he is a very friendly person, he drives responsibly, and in addition, he gives them affordable prices. He is a family man. He favorite place when he is not working is his home, because he shares it with his wife and children. With the passing of the years, his house has deteriorated a little, especially the roof, and in this rainy season he needs to repair it, but he needs capital, and it is for this reason that he is applying to INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow him to buy sheets of roofing material, poles, pins, gutters, and so forth. 

Gustavo has good credit references and is sure that he will be able to pay off his debt and at the same time give his family the quality of life that they deserve.

loans.use: to buy roofing material, poles, pins, and gutters

loans.name: Elpidio

texts.en: Elpidio is 46 years old and takes care of four children at home. He manages a farm in order to ensure food security for his family. Elpidio is a hardworking, conscientious man. He is married. His wife works as a full-time house wife. Elpidio grows and sells crops. He began growing rice and now wants to expand this business. Elpidio would like to receive a loan to purchase fertilizer, seeds to grow, and also to pay the workers' salaries.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of rice seed and fertilizer for his farm business.

loans.name: Johnny

texts.en: Johnny is from the village of San Juan. He is 46 years old, married, and lives with his family. His wife Racquel is a full-time house wife. Johnny works as a farmer in the village. He is vigorously involved in farming activities. Johnny requested credit amounting to PHP 20,000 to purchase fertilizer and seed to grow. He hopes to use the profit from this loan to acquire more land for farming, to increase his crop production, and to educate his children. His hope is to become a large-scale farmer, buy a bigger piece of land, and build rental houses. He is a hard-working man who can do more if supported financially.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and seed to grow for his farm

loans.name: Sandra Patricia

texts.es: Sandra Patricia de treinta y ocho años de edad vive junto a su familia conformada por su compañero de vida y sus hijos, residen en casa propia, ella se dedica desde hace muchos años a la venta de ropa y cosméticos, la ropa que comercia es muy novedosa tiene en gran variedad para damas, caballeros y niños, camisas, faldas, pantalones, vestidos entre otros, su negocio está ubicado en un lugar muy estratégico, es muy conocida en la zona, los clientes la prefieren porque siempre encuentran ahí todo lo que necesitan, de calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es inigualable; Sandra es una mujer dedicada a su labor, ella ama su trabajo, su más grande secreto es la motivación y la entrega sabe que así logrará el éxito, ha aumentado la demanda y quiere invertir en más insumo por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa por mayor y cosméticos. Sandra Patricia tiene buenas referencias crediticias y está segura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez ofrecerle a su familia un futuro más próspero.
texts.en:
Sandra Patricia is thirty-eight years old and lives with her family which is made up of her life companion and her children. They live in their own house. For many years she has been earning her living selling clothes and cosmetics. The clothing she sells is very fashionable and she has a great variety for women, men, kids, shirts, blouses, pants, dresses amongst others. Her business is located in a very strategic location. It is very well-known in the area and her customers prefer her shop because they always find everything they need there, and the clothing is of good-quality and at accessible prices. The service is also unbeatable. 

Sandra is a very dedicated to her work. She loves her work. Her biggest secret is her motivation and dedication and she knows that with this she will be successful. Demand has increased and she wants to invest in more supplies. For this reason she is asking INTEGRAL for a loan which will allow her to buy clothes wholesale and cosmetics. Sandra Patricia has very good credit references and is sure that she will be able to repay the loan and at the same time provide her family with a more prosperous future.

loans.use: to buy wholesale clothing and cosmetics, such as skirts, blouses and jeans as well as facial creams, lipstick and make up.

loans.name: Roel

texts.en: A very responsible father and husband of Ofelia with three school-aged children, Roel, 52, has managed a farm for ten years. To have a good harvest he is requesting a loan to purchase fertilizer and seed for his farm. This loan is a big help for him because he maintains the needs of his family. In the future, Roel hopes that his farm will expand to help meet the needs of his family, especially the needs of his children.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and seed for his farm

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, soap, shampoo and beverages

loans.name: Rodolfo

texts.en: Rodolfo has been engaged in planting crops basically all his life, as it was his father who taught him everything about plant production. Rodolfo is now 57 and is married. He has two children who he is teaching how to work in the fields to honestly earn their living, just as his father did with him. On top of planting crops, Rodolfo also engages in breeding cattle, an activity that helps him earn money during the months in which his corn and rice bushes are in bloom. As a crop grower, Rodolfo’s main goal is to plant more crops this month. For this reason he is requesting a loan of PHP 15,000. The crops he will plant will bear fruit in five months, but with the production of his next harvest he will get the necessary resources to repay his loan. He knows that if he correctly invests his money he will get an income in a short time, and this will help make his other activities grow. In turn, this will grant a better standard of living for him and his family.

loans.use: to buy seed and fertilizer for his farm

loans.name: Ana Gloria

texts.es: Ana Gloria de 54 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto a su hermano, desde hace 10 años. Ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de ricos platillos. Con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación logro establecer un comedor en el mercado central de la zona donde habita. La ubicación del negocio es muy accesible puesto que es una zona muy transitada y visitada por muchas personas. La señora Ana ha trabajado toda su vida para ganarse el pan de cada día. Es una mujer que se caracteriza  por ser trabajadora, luchadora, responsable y carismática. Gracias al buen desempeño que realiza en su negocio muchas personas la prefieren y expresan estar satisfechas con el servicio que Ana ofrece, ya que ofrece calidad, higiene y  buenos precios en sus platillos. Piensa que su negocio necesita que se le dé un  impulso, ya que con una mayor oferta podría mejorar sus niveles de venta y de ingresos, lo cual le permitiría mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su hermano. Con mucha humildad se acerco a esta institución para que le ayuden con un préstamo para hacer la inversión que necesita en materia prima (verduras, frutas, carnes, bebidas, maíz, frijoles, arroz, etc.) para la elaboración de los ricos platillos. Confía que de esta forma logrará su sueño y podrá continuar llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar.
texts.en: Ana Gloria, 54, has lived in her own house with her brother for 10 years.  She has a business making and selling delicious dishes.  With a lot of effort and dedication, she managed to establish an eatery in a central market in the neighborhood where she lives.  The business is located in a very accessible place where many people pass through.  Ana has worked all of her life to earn her daily sustenance.  She is a woman who is known for being hardworking, tenacious, responsible and charismatic.  Thanks to her good performance in her business, many people prefer it.  They state that they are satisfied with the service that Ana offers, because she offers quality food, operates in a clean environment, and charges reasonable prices.   She thinks that her business needs to be given a stimulus, because if she could offer more she could increase her sales and income.  This would allow her to improve the quality of life for herself and her brother.  She approached this institution with a lot of humility to obtain the help of a loan, so that she can make the investment she needs in supplies (vegetables, fruit, meat, drinks, corn, beans, rice, etc.) to make her rich dishes.  She's confident that in this way, she will achieve her dream and will be able to continue to bring daily sustenance to her household.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, fruit, meat, drinks, corn, beans, rice, etc

loans.name: Cristina Magaly

texts.es:
En el sitio Santa Martha de la  parroquia Riochico en Portoviejo, cada quince días se  reúnen las socias del Banco Comunal Querer Es Poder De Riochico. Este lugar se lo conoce por su vegetación donde la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura.

En este lugar vive la señora Cristina, tiene 38 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene tres hijos de  16, 12 y 6 años los mismos que estudian los  mayores en colegio y el  menor en escuela. El marido se dedica al comercio.

Nuestra amiga  es una gran ama de casa que además se dedica al a compra y venta de pollos, para lo cual tres días a la semana pone un pequeño local en su casa en el cual vende pollos enteros  y por libras pero ya pelados listos para el consumo, nos cuenta que tiene muchos clientes que le  llegan  a comprar los pollo ya que los entrega bien limpios. Nos cuenta que lleva realizando esta actividad por más de seis años y que le va muy bien.

Ella está repitiendo el crédito, nos cuenta que con el crédito anterior su negocio mejoro y las ganancias que le quedaron por su trabajo lo empleo en cosas necesarias para sus hijos como útiles escolares, uniformes y varias cosas más  para los estudios de ellos, para ella los créditos le han facilitado su vida ya que antes no tenía financiamiento y ahora todo se le hace más fácil con los créditos. Este crédito lo va a utilizar para comprar más pollos para la venta diaria. Este es su cuarto ciclo y le gusta por la facilidad que ha tenido para conseguir los créditos.

Su sueño es tener una gran tienda.
texts.en:
In Santa Martha of Parish Riochico in Portoviejo, every 15 days members of Communal Bank "Querer es Poder" of Riochico meet. This place is known fors it vegetation where the majority of the inhabitants work in agriculture.

Here lives Mrs. Cristina, who is 38 years old, lives in a common-law-marriage, and has a 16, 12, and 6 year old. The oldest is in college and the younger two still in school. Her husband is a salesman.

Our friend is a great housewife who also dedicates her time buying and selling chickens. Three days a week she puts a small stand in her home where she sells whole chickens or by the pound ready for consumption. She tells us that she has lots of clients that come and buy from her because she cleans them thoroughly. She has been working in this business for more than 8 years and it has been going very well.

She is requesting another loan. Her previous loans improved her business and with her extra income was able to pay for school supplies, uniforms, various other things, and her children's education. The loans have made life easier for her. She will use this loan to buy more chickens to sell daily. This will be her fourth loan cycle and she likes the ease of obtaining loans.

Her dream is to have a great store.

loans.use: to buy chickens

loans.name: María Elizabeth

texts.es:
En el sitio Santa Martha de la  parroquia Riochico en Portoviejo,  cada quince días se  reúnen las socias del Banco Comunal Querer Es Poder De Riochico. Este lugar se lo conoce por su vegetación donde la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura.

En este lugar vive la señora María, tiene 44 años de edad, en la actualidad está separada pero de esa relación tiene cinco hijos, cuatro mayores y el menor de 17 años de edad que estudia en colegio, dos de sus hijos aun viven en su casa.

Nuestra amiga se dedica a diversas actividades para sacar adelante a sus hijos pues su marido los dejo cuando sus hijos estaban aun pequeños y desde allí tuvo que valerse por sí misma para que nada les faltara, ella se dedica a la venta de productos de bazar y venta de comida, ella trabaja  todos los días en las mañanas y tardes en lo que es  la venta de comida pues prepara desayunos y almuerzos, su especialidad es la venta de tongas que son un plato con arroz y gallina criolla pero envuelto en hojas de plátano lo cual es muy apetecido por sus clientes, en cuanto a sus ventas de productos de bazar los realiza en su casa o si no sale a vender puerta a puerta, ella lleva más de 15 años dedicada a esta actividad y le ha ido muy bien.

Nuestra amiga está repitiendo el crédito ya que desde que esta recibiendo la ayuda de los créditos su vida a mejorado y también su negocio, nos cuenta que con lo que ahora le queda extra ella lo emplea en comprar cosas necesarias para los estudios de su hijo menor. Este crédito lo va utilizar en comprar productos de bazar, arroz, y otros víveres para preparar los alimentos. Lleva tres ciclos en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la rapidez con que salen los créditos.

Su sueño es que a sus hijos no les falte nada.
texts.en:
In Santa Martha of Parish Riochico in Portoviejo, every 15 days members of Communal Bank "Querer es Poder" of Riochico meet. This place is known fors it vegetation where the majority of the inhabitants work in agriculture.

Here lives Mrs. María, who is 44years old, separated, and has 5 children 4 of which are grown-up and a 17 year old in high school. Two of her children still live at home.

Our friend works in various types of businesses to maintain her children since her husband left them when they were very young. Since then she took it upon herself to make sure they were raised well. She sells hardware tools and food. She works daily from morning to evenings to sell breakfast and lunches. Her specialty is Tonga which consists of rice and chicken wrapped in banana leaves and has a high demand from her clients. She sells the hardware tools from her home or sells door to door. She has been working in these businesses for more than 15 years and has done very well.

She is requesting another loan since her previous loans improved her business and made her life easier. She plans on using her extra income to pay for her youngest son's education. She will use this loan to buy more tools, rice, and other supplies to make plates to sell. This will be her third loan cycle and she likes the quickness of obtaining loans.

Her dream is to be able to offer her children all they need.

loans.use: To buy food supplies and stationery.

loans.name: Carmen Jesús

texts.es:
En el sitio Santa Martha de la  parroquia Riochico en Portoviejo,  cada quince días se  reúnen las socias del Banco Comunal Querer Es Poder De Riochico. Este lugar se lo conoce por su vegetación donde la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Carmen, tiene 34 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen cuatro hijos de 15, 14, 12 y 11 años de edad, los tres mayores estudian en colegio y  la menor en escuela. Su esposo es chofer. 

Nuestra amiga se dedica a la cría de aves de corral y chanchos, ella  tiene una pequeña granja en la cual cría estos animalitos, nos cuenta que  los compra pequeños y que los mantiene de dos a tres meses que es el tiempo que necesitan para estar listos para la venta, luego los entrega a comerciantes y personas de lugar que le compran estos animalitos para el consumo. Ella también tiene cultivos de ciclo invernal en la actualidad y esta por recoger maíz y maní, con este crédito quiere pagar la mano de obra de la recolección y guardar los productos para cuando tengan mejor precio, también va a comprar alimento para los pollos.

Ella está repitiendo el crédito, nos cuenta que con el crédito anterior pudieron sembrar varias hectáreas de maíz cultivos que ya están recogiendo, además siguió con la cría de pollos con lo cual tuvo buenos ingresos los mismos que le ayudaron con los gastos de útiles escolares de sus hijos ya que a su esposo no le alcanzaba para esto y que gracias a su trabajo ella pudo cubrir. Es su cuarto  ciclo en el Banco Comunal y está muy contenta porque los créditos que ha recibido le han ayudado mucho tanto en su negocio como en su vida personal. 

Su sueño es darles lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
In Santa Martha of Parish Riochico in Portoviejo, every 15 days members of Communal Bank "Querer es Poder" of Riochico meet. This place is known fors it vegetation where the majority of the inhabitants work in agriculture.

Here lives Mrs. Carmen, who is 34 years old, married, and has 4 children ranging from 11, 12, 14, 15 years of age. Three of them are in high school and the youngest in junior high school. Her husband is a chauffeur.

Our friend raises chickens and pigs. She has a small farm where she raises her animals. She buys them when they are young then raises them for two to three months which is the time needed for them to be ready for sale. She then sells them to sellers and clients for consumption. She also has crops that are ready to be picked which consist of corn and peanut. She will use the loan to pay for labor in collection and storage of her crops for later sale. She sill also buy feed for her chickens.

She is requesting another loan since with her previous loans was able to sew many hectares of corn. She was also able to raise chickens and use the income to pay for her children's education since her husband did not have enough at the time. This will be her fourth loan cycle with the communal bank and is happy because the loans have helped her with her business and personal life.

Her dream is to be able to offer her children the best life possible.

loans.use: buy chicken feed and pay for labor

loans.name: Silvino

texts.en:
Silvino is the father of five grown children. For the past 15 years, he has been a farmer and he also operates a retail shop to supplement his farming income. Silvino's farm produces crops such as rice and corn which he sells in five months. The shortage of water results in high costs.

Silvino is requesting a PHP 10,000 loan from Kiva and ASKI to buy fertilizer and seed to grow. Acquiring these will improve his ability in farming and enable him to improve his family's standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seed to grow

loans.name: Jose Higinio

texts.es: José Higinio de cuarenta y tres años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida  y sus hijos; Él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene varios años de dedicarse a la agricultura y eso le ha regalado experiencia muy valiosa, su terreno está ubicado cerca de su residencia, es muy conocido en la zona pues comercia en todos los alrededores, todo lo que vende es de primera calidad y a precios  accesibles además el servicio es excelente; José es un hombre muy dedicado a su labor, visionario piensa que entre más se esfuerza más grande será la recompensa, quiere trabajar duro y aumentar la producción pero necesita invertir en insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol,  insecticida, herramienta, etc. José Higinio es un hombre responsable y con moral intachable tiene muy buenas referencias crediticias y está seguro que podrá saldar el financiamiento en el periodo establecido y a la vez darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: José Higinio, who is 43 years old, lives with his life companion and their children. He grows corn and beans. He has worked in agriculture for a number of years, and this has given him very valuable experience. His land is located close to his home. He is well-known is the zone, since he trades throughout the surrounding area. Everything that he sells is of first quality and at affordable prices. In addition, his service is excellent. José is a man who is very dedicated to his work. A visionary, he thinks that the harder he tries, the greater will be the reward. He likes to work hard and increase production, but he needs to invest in supplies. For this reason, he is applying to INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow him to buy seeds for corn and beans, insecticides, tools, and so forth. José Higinio is a responsible man with impeccable morals. He has very good credit references and is sure that he will be able to repay the loan in the established period and at the same time give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy seeds for corn and beans, insecticides, and tools.

loans.name: Severino

texts.en:
Severino is married with three children. All of them are enrolled in school. His wife works as a farmer. He has been a rice farmer for 11 years. He would like to get this loan to buy seeds and support labor costs to get the best harvest. With the profits, he plans to expand the area he has been using to get more output.

Severino is requesting a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy seeds and support labor costs. He hopes that his business expands so that he can sustain the needs of his family.

loans.use: to buy seeds and support labor costs for his farm business

loans.name: Gregory Mark

texts.en: Gregory Mark is newly wed to May. He is 34 years old and he and his wife have one infant daughter. Gregory is a very hardworking man and patient in his work. He has been involved in a farming business for five years. Gregory Mark is requesting a loan of PHP 15,000 to purchase a sack of rice seed and manure for fertilizer. Gregory hopes that he can expand his business, and to build their own house someday.

loans.use: to purchase a sack of rice seed and fertilizer for his farm

loans.name: María Domitila

texts.es: María Domitila tiene 56 años de  edad y habita en casa de su propiedad desde hace muchos años. Ella vive junto con su grupo familiar el cual está conformado por su esposo e hijo. La señora María se dedica a la elaboración y venta de ricos tamales y de deliciosas tortillas. Las ventas las realiza de manera ambulante en los diferentes caseríos vecinos.  Su sueño es dar a su hijo mejores condiciones a las que ella y su esposo han tenido. Todo esto la motiva a continuar trabajando, ya que ella es uno de los principales soportes económicos de su hogar. Con visión de asegurar su negocio que es una de las principales fuentes de ingresos que posee, ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de los insumos necesarios  tales como: pollos, maíz, hojas, verduras, etc.  Para la elaboración de los tamales y tortillas que cada día comercializa con sus vecinos, los cuales la prefieren por ser honesta, trabajadora, y responsable. Espera que con esta ayuda pueda aumentar su oferta y por consecuencia las ventas e ingresos que le permitan accesar  a una mejor calidad de vida para ella y su familia.
texts.en:
María Domitila is 56 years old and has lived in her own home for many years. She lives with her family, which is made up of her husband and son. María makes and sells tasty tamales and delicious tortillas. She makes her rounds selling in different neighborhoods. 

Her dream is to give her son better conditions than what she and her husband have had. All of this motivates her to keep working, as she is one of the main economic supports of her home. With the idea of insuring her business - which is one of the primary sources of income that she has - María made the decision to request this loan from Integral to invest in the purchase of some necessary goods, such as chicken, corn, leaf wrappers, vegetables, etc., to make tamales and tortillas. Every day she markets to her neighbors, who prefer her because she is honest, hard-working and responsible. 

She hopes that with this help she can increase her offerings and as a result, her sales and profits will allow her to reach a better quality of life for herself and her family.

loans.use: to buy chicken, corn, leaf wrappers, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Limay

texts.en:
Limay is 33 years old, married and has two children attending school. She is married to Joel, a hog raiser in their village. Limay got involved in a direct selling business. She sells personal products, perfumes, soap and cosmetics. She has been in her business for three years now. Limay would like to increase her income so she wants to offer more products. From this, she is now borrowing a loan of PHP 11,000 to buy shampoo, soap, cosmetics and perfumes to sell and increase her sales.

In the future, Limay would like to establish a stall to conveniently offer her products and be able to give the best education to her children.

loans.use: to buy shampoo, soap, cosmetics and perfumes to sell

loans.name: Severo

texts.en:
Severo, 54, lives with Nenita and they have six children. He owns the house they live in and it’s in Cabisera 2 province of Isabela.

Since he was a child, his parents taught him to work the land. He liked to see how the crops grew and matured. His more than 15 years’ experience in agriculture has brought him many things: the house he now lives in, furniture, appliances as well as his children’s education. 

Now, he plants corn and rice on several parcels in his locality. That’s where he spends most of his day since he has to protect his crops from infestations that are currently attacking his plants. 

Severo needs capital because this month the rice season starts. “In this season, profits from sales are large,” he comments. He’s grateful for the support, because it taught him to continue forward despite difficulties.


Severo will invest the money he’s requesting in the purchase of four bags of seeds. He will use the rest of the money to buy fertilizer.

loans.use: to buy seed and fertilizer for his farm business

loans.name: Raquel Armando

texts.es: Raquel Armando de cuarenta y uno años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz, y ya tiene varios años de dedicarse a la agricultura, su terreno está ubicado en una zona con buena incidencia agrícola, sus siembras siempre son las mejores de la zona, el comercia en todos los alrededores y ya tiene mucha clientela fija pues todo lo que vende siempre es de excelente calidad y a precios accesibles además es muy conocido por gran amabilidad; Raquel Armando es un hombre dedicado a su labor, visionario siempre aprovecha cada oportunidad que se le presenta en el camino, en la última cosecha tuvo pérdidas que no le permitieron alcanzar las ganancias esperadas, por eso en esta temporada quiere recuperarse e invertir en insumos pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, fertilizante insecticida, herramientas, etc. Raquel Armando es un hombre de moral, honesto con buenas referencias de pago, tiene la certeza que podrá cancelar la deuda y a la vez podrá darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Raquel Armando, 41-years-old, lives with his life partner and his children.  He makes a living growing corn and already has several years of experience making a living through agriculture.  His land is located in a zone with good agricultural activity, and his crops are always the best in the area.  He sells in all the surrounding areas and already has many loyal customers since everything that he sells is always of excellent quality and affordable prices.  In addition, he is well-known for his great kindness.

Raquel Armando is a man dedicated to his work, a visionary always taking advantage of every opportunity that presents itself along the way.  During the last harvest he had losses that did not allow him to reach the earnings he had expected, which is why in this season he wants to recover and invest in supplies, but he needs the capital.  For this reason he asks INTEGRAL for a loan that allows him to buy corn seed, insecticide fertilizer, tools, etc.  Raquel Armando is a man of values, is honest with good payment references, has the certainty that he will be able to settle the debt, and at the same time be able to give his family a full life.

loans.use: to buy corn seed, insecticide fertilizer, and tools.

loans.name: Delfin

texts.en: Delfin is married. His wife's name is Rebecca. They have two children. Delfin has his own business; he is engaged in farming. He grows agriculture crops such as rice and corn. He likes this business and wants to develop it. Delfin is industrious, enterprising, and goal-oriented. This business is the main source of income for Delfin's family. He is asking for a loan in the amount of PHP 15,000 to buy fertilizer and seeds. The loan will help him increase profits and improve the welfare of his family.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer for his farm business

loans.name: Amelia

texts.en:
Amelia is 49 years old and married. She lives in the San Juan province of Isabela. 

Amelia is a farmer who grows crops. Amelia is requesting a loan to buy insecticides, fertilizers, urea, and compost. With the help of this loan, she will be able to buy fertilizers. Her purchases are conducted in town. Her dream is to have a house of her own and a stable business. The challenge she faces is dealing with competition. 

In her free time, Amelia enjoys reading the Bible, singing, and watching television.

loans.use: to buy insecticides, fertilizers, urea, and compost

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria lives in Padul with her spouse. So do her six children, all of whom live separatley from them. Maria's spouse is a farmer while she is in the buy-and-sell business. She buys vegetables at the market and resells them in their village for a profit. She had been doing this business for over five years now and earns about P5,000 each month doing these activities.
 
Now, Maria would like to take out a loan of P11,000 to improve her sales. With her loan, she will buy cabbage, eggplant, and tomatoes to sell. This will help increase her profits too. 

In the future, Maria hopes to keep growing as a successful vendor and save funds to use in times of emergencies.

loans.use: to buy cabbage, eggplant, and tomatoes to sell

loans.name: Dede

texts.en:
Dede owns a prepaid cell phone airtime shop (a Warung Pulsa). The shop is located in Tangerang.  Other than the prepaid airtime business, Dede also became a water gallon reseller.  Meaning, people will come and ask him to send and replace their drinking water in their house.  By offering an electronic bill payment point with Loket Ruma he will generate more income for himself and his family.  

The reason why he wants to add Loket Ruma to his business is because he sees the market and high demand for it in his neighborhood.  All his neighbors will come to him and pay all their bills in his shop.  He believes that the all the neighbors will use his new bill payment service to pay their electricity bills, motorcycle installments, and post-paid mobile phone bills.  Sometimes, with his oldest son, he will stand by in the shop and serve the customers.  His second child is only nine months old.

loans.use: To pay for a deposit on an electronic data capture (EDC) machine for his bill payment business

loans.name: María Vilma

texts.es: María Vilma tiene 38 años de edad ya habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su esposo y dos hijos. Ella se caracteriza por ser muy trabajadora, humilde, responsable e higiénica. Desde hace mucho tiempo se dedica al cultivo de maíz y a la elaboración y venta de ricas tortillas. Junto a su esposo el cual es motorista, lo que más desean es mejorar las condiciones de vida de sus hijos ya que para ellos lo más importante es que sus hijos  tengan acceso a mejores condiciones de vida a la ellos han tenido. La señora María es muy conocida  en la zona ya que con su experiencia y buen desempeño del trabajo ha logrado ganarse la confianza de muchos clientes y de sus vecinos.  Debido a que los ingresos que perciben no logran cubrir las principales necesidades de su hogar, cada día busca la forma de hacer dinero de forma honrada para lograr su sueño de dar a su familia mejores condiciones. Solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de los insumos  agrícolas necesarios (abonos, semillas, insecticidas, etc.) para la siembra del maíz, ya que la temporada ya comenzó y es necesario comenzar la siembra lo antes posible. Confía en Dios que con su trabajo y la ayuda de esta institución logrará una buena cosecha la cual le permita lograr su sueño y continuar llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar.
texts.en:
María Vilma is 38, and lives in her own home together with her husband and two children.  She is known for being very hard-working, humble, responsible, and hygienic.  For a long time she has made a living though growing corn and making and selling rich tortillas.  Together with her spouse, who is a motorist, what they most hope for is to improve their living conditions for their children since what is most important for them is that their children have access to better living conditions than they did.  Señora María is well-known in the area because with her experience and good work performance she has managed to earn the trust of many customers and her neighbors.  Due to the income that they get they have not managed to cover the main necessities for their home.  Every day she seeks a way to make money in an honest way in order to achieve her dream of giving her family better conditions.  

She asks for this loan from INTEGRAL to invest in the purchase of necessary agricultural supplies (fertilizer, seed, insecticide, etc.) in order to grow corn since the season has already begun and it is necessary to start the sowing as soon as possible.  She trusts in God that with work and the help from this institution she will get a good harvest which will allow her to achieve her dream and continue bringing bread home every day.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, seeds, insecticide, etc.

loans.name: Jinjin

texts.en:
JinJin is 39 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 4 children. 
JinJin has a food/ retail shop or sari-sari store that buys & sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products & beverages. She had has this business for 8 years. She requested a loan for 7,000 to buy stock of canned goods, snacks & beverages.
JinJin has been a member of HSPFI since 2012.  In the future, JinJin hopes to improve her business for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, soap, shampoo, and beverages

loans.name: Tri Pudji

texts.en:
Tri Pudji owns a shop located in a very dense pouplation area in East Jakarta. Other than cell phone airtime prepaids that he sells, his shop provides instant noodles, snacks, drinks, shampoo sachets, cigarettes, ice cream, gas, and candies. 

Tri Pudji is interested in Ruma's bill payment business because he has been in Ruma's network for quite some time. He sees that Loket Ruma business is a good business that he can explore. He hopes his current customers, and eventually with this business, new customers, will come and pay their electricity bills, water bills, landline phone bills, and motorcycle installments in his shop. 

Tri Pudji is married and has two children. The first one is 13 and his second is 9 years old. In the end, the goal of joining this bill payment business is to actually earn more money for the family. 

This loan will be used to pay for a deposit on an Electronic Data Capture machine.  The EDC itself is a machine that helps a person to become a payment point by providing a system to help customers pay their bills instead of  queuing at the bank. Meaning, people can come and pay their bills through the machine and do transactions in a very short time.

loans.use: To pay for a deposit on an electronic data capture (EDC) machine for his bill payment business

loans.name: Patricia Elizabeth

texts.es: Patricia Elizabeth de veintidós años de edad vive junto a su familia, ella se dedica a la venta de artículos de bisutería, colas, collares, ganchos, anillos entre otros, tiene varios años de dedicarse al negocio es con el que mantienen los gastos del hogar, su negocio está ubicado en un lugar muy estratégico y es muy conocida por las personas se ha hecho de mucha clientela últimamente, pues las personas saben que todo lo que comercia es de primera calidad y lo vende a precios accesibles además el servicio es excelente; Patricia es una mujer emprendedora dispuesta siempre a superarse quiere alcanzar el éxito y trabajara duro para lograrlo, quiere hacer crecer el negocio y  necesita invertir pero necesita de capital es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ganchos, collares, colas, por mayor, etc. Patricia tiene muy buenas referencias crediticias y está segura que podrá cancelar el financiamiento y a la vez darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Patricia Elizabeth, 22, lives with her family.  She sells costume jewelry, hair accessories, necklaces, and rings, among other things.  She has had the business for several years, and she covers the household expenses with it.

Her business is located in a very strategic place and she is very well known by people.  Lately she has acquired a lot of customers because people know that everything she sells is top quality and she sells it at affordable prices.  In addition, her service is excellent.

Patricia is an enterprising woman always ready to improve herself.  She wants to be successful and she will work hard to achieve it.  She wants to make her business grow and she needs to invest, but she needs capital.

This is why she's asking INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow her to buy wholesale hair accessories, necklaces, etc.

Patricia has very good credit references and is sure she will be able to make her loan payments and at the same time give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy hair accessories and necklaces wholesale.

loans.name: Ratna

texts.en:
Ibu Ratna lives in Tambun, Bekasi with her family. She owns a shop that sells prepaid cell phone airtime and rents Playstation games. The reason why she wants to own a bill payment business with Ruma, is because Ruma has fast and quick transactions, is easy, and is also an inexpensive product that will bring more customers to her shop. 

By becoming a Loket Ruma (a member of Ruma's bill payment network), Ibu Ratna hopes that current and new customers will come to her shop and pay their electricity bills, motorcycle installment, and landline phone bills. 

Her shop was name based on her twin kid. She is married and has a twin (two boys, currently 18 years old) and a girl with the age of 14. The goal by having this a payment point business is to explore more opportunities, and also generate more income from the current business.

loans.use: To pay for a deposit on an electronic data capture (EDC) machine for her bill payment business

loans.name: Jose Domingo

texts.es: José Domingo de veintinueve años de edad vive junto a su familia que está conformado por su compañera de vida y sus hijos; él se dedica a la agricultura específicamente a la siembra de maíz y frijol y tiene de respaldo la siembra de café ya lleva varios años de trabajar en este rubro, se ha hecho de mucha experiencia y siempre obtiene las mejores cosechas,  se levanta desde muy temprano para aprovechar el día, el comercia en todos los alrededores de la zona y se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues saben que todo lo que comercia es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es excelente; José es un hombre emprendedor y visionario siempre está a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades, quiere aumentar sus ganancias pero necesita invertir en insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, fertilizante, herramientas, etc. José Domingo tiene un buen record crediticio sabe que tiene la capacidad de saldar la deuda y a la vez darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: José Domingo is 22 years old, lives with his family which consists of his life partner and children. He is a farmer and grows corn, beans, and coffee. He has been working in the business for many years. He has gained much experience and always has that best crops. He wakes up very early to start off the day. He sells in all of the area's outskirts. He has a large clientele since they know he sells quality products at reasonable prices, and offers excellent service. José is a dedicated and visionary man since he is on the look out for new opportunities. He wants to increase his income but first needs to invest in materials which is why he is requesting INTEGRAL a loan to buy corn and beans seeds, fertilizer, tools, etc. José has good credit and knows he can pay back the loan and offer his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: buy corn and beans seeds, fertilizer, tools, etc

loans.name: Maria Evelin

texts.es: María Evelin de cincuenta y uno años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida, sus hijos y sus nietos; ella se dedica a la venta de cosméticos y también para complementar los gastos del hogar vende requesón, queso y crema, tiene varios años de tener el negocio y es muy conocida en el lugar, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues  todo lo que comercia es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es excelente; María es una mujer emprendedora, visionaria siempre está a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades, quiere hacer crecer el negocio y planea invertir en insumos, pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar cosméticos y lácteos por mayor. María Evelin tiene la experiencia crediticia y muy buenas recomendaciones, tiene la certeza que podrá saldar su financiamiento y a la vez podrá darle a su familia la calidad de vida que se merece.
texts.en: María Evelin is 50 years old, lives with her life partner, children, and grandchildren. She sells cosmetics for a living. She also sells cottage cheese, cheese, and cream to help pay household expenditures. She had been working in this business for many years and is well-known in her area. She has a large clientele since she sells quality products, at reasonable prices, and offers excellent service. María is a dedicated and visionary woman since she is on the lookout for new opportunities. She wants to grow her business and plans on investing in materials. She lacked the funds to do so therefore she is requesting INTEGRAL a loan to buy wholesale cosmetics and dairy. María Evelin has good credit and good recommendations. She's confident she will be able to pay back the loan and offer her family the life they deserve

loans.use: buy wholesale cosmetics and dairy

loans.name: Ceferino

texts.es: Ceferino habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su esposa la cual es artesana. Desde hace muchos años se dedica al cultivo de maíz. Aprendió a cultivar la tierra desde que era muy pequeño, debido a que sus padres no le pudieron apoyar con la educación escolar. Gracias a los conocimientos de la agricultura heredados por sus padres, logra ganarse la vida y llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar, ya que cada año cultiva maíz para luego poder vender una parte de la cosecha y cubrir las necesidades de su hogar. Es muy importante destacar que habita en condiciones muy sencillas y humildes junto a su familia. El señor Ceferino es muy honrado, trabajador, responsable y luchador. Tienen buenas referencias ya que sus vecinos están satisfechos con el servicio que él ofrece. Solicita este préstamo a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de los insumos agrícolas necesarios (semillas, abonos, insecticidas, etc.) para dar inicio, lo antes posible a la siembra de los granos básicos que son muy importantes para continuar llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar y tratar de mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia.
texts.en: Caferino lives at home with his wife who is an artisan. For many years now he has been growing corn. From a very young age he learned how to grow crops since his parents could not afford an education for him. Thanks to all that he has learned in agriculture through his parents he was able to maintain a living and feed his family. Every year he grew corn, he sold a portion of the crop, and was able to pay for household expenditures. It is important to mention that he lives in very simple and humble conditions with his family. Mr.Caferino is very honorable, hard-working, responsible, and driven. He has positive references since the neighbors are satisfied with the service he offers them. He is requesting INTEGRAL a loan to buy materials (seeds, fertilizer, insecticides, etc.) to start off the cultivation of his crops which are important in continuing his daily work and offer a better quality of life for his family.

loans.use: buy seeds, fertilizer, insecticides, etc

loans.name: Enaldo Alonso

texts.es: Enaldo Alonso de cuarenta y ocho años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos, él se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de maíz y frijol , tiene doce años de dedicarse a este rubro y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia, siempre obtiene las mejores cosechas,  comercia en todos los alrededores y en diferentes agro-servicios, ya tiene mucha clientela pues todo lo que vende es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles, además el servicio es inigualable siempre está a la orden de los clientes; Enaldo es un hombre emprendedor con muchas ganas de salir adelante siempre está a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades, quiere aumentar la siembra pero necesita de capital, por eso solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, fertilizante, insecticida, etc. Enaldo posee buenas referencias y sabe que tiene la capacidad de cancelar el crédito y a la vez darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Enaldo Alonso, 44, lives with his life partner and his children.  He works in agriculture, specifically growing corn and beans.  He has worked in this area for 12 years and has acquired a lot of experience.  He always gets the best harvests.  He sells in all the neighboring areas and to different agricultural suppliers.  He already has a lot of customers because everything he sells is of top quality and at affordable prices.  In addition, his service is unequaled; he is always ready for the customers.

Enaldo is an enterprising man who very much wants to get ahead.  He is always waiting for new opportunities.  He wants to increase the planting but he needs capital.  This is why he is asking INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow him to buy corn seed, beans, fertilizer, insecticide, etc.

Enaldo has good references and knows he has the ability to pay back the loan and give his family a better quality of life at the same time.

loans.use: to buy corn seed, beans, fertilizer, and insecticide.

loans.name: Verónica Lizzette

texts.es: Verónica Lizzette tiene 30 años de edad y habita en casa familiar junto a su esposo. Ella  se dedica a la reparación de bicicletas y su esposo trabaja en una comercial. Debido a que el ingreso percibido por su esposo no eran suficiente para satisfacer las principales necesidades de la familia,  comenzó con un pequeño taller de bicicletas en su hogar de habitación. Tiene mucha experiencia en el área y gracias a su buen desempeño en el trabajo ha logrado ganarse la confianza de muchas personas, que cada día la prefieren más. Es una mujer increíble la cual trabaja muy duro para poder colaborar con los gastos de los alimentos de  su hogar. Como toda una mujer emprendedora con aspiraciones de superarse ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este credito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio en la compra de: pintura, repuestos, llantas, neumáticos, agujas, etc. Para dar un mejor servicio  a sus clientes y así poder atraer a más personas que soliciten sus servicios. Tiene mucha confianza  que de esta forma logrará  incrementar sus ingresos los cuales le permitirán  mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Verónica Lizzette is 30 years old and lives with her husband in their house. She repairs bicycles and her husband works in a business. Due to the fact that her husband's wages weren't sufficient to cover the family's basic necessities, she started a small bicycle workshop in her bedroom. She has a lot of experience in this field and thanks to the good results of her work, she has won the confidence of many people and she is becoming the preferred bicycle repair shop more and more each day. She is an incredible woman that works hard to contribute to the household expenses. She is an enterprising woman with aspirations of bettering herself and this is why she has made the decision to request a loan through INTEGRAL to invest in her business by purchasing paint, spare parts, rims, wheels, needles, etc. This will help her to better serve her customers and to be able to attract more customers. She is confident that in this way she will increase her income to improve her and her family's quality of life.

loans.use: purchase paint, spare parts, rims, tires, needles, etc.

loans.name: María Gladis

texts.es: María Gladis tiene 38 años de edad y habita en casa de su propiedad junto a su esposo y su hijo de 14 años el cual se encuentra estudiando. María se dedica al negocio de tienda desde hace varios años. Su compañero de vida ayuda con los gastos del hogar, con los ingresos que logra percibir de su trabajo en la tierra, ya que él se dedica a la agricultura. Los dos trabajan duramente para sacar adelante a su hijo ya que para ellos es  lo más importante en la vida y quieren darle mejores oportunidades de vida a las que ellos han tenido. Este negocio es su principal fuente de ingresos  por lo que es   muy importante mantenerlo activo y seguir persiguiendo los beneficios que hasta el momento han recibido con satisfacción. Cuenta con algunos clientes fijos los cuales están muy satisfechos con el servicio que  ofrece, además cuenta con muy buenas referencias de sus vecinos,  dado que se caracteriza por ser una mujer honesta, trabajadora y sobre todo dedicada a su trabajo. Ha pensado mucho en la forma de mejorar sus ingresos y ha llegado a la conclusión de que la mejor forma es invirtiendo en mercadería para su tienda, ya que de esta forma lograría atraer a más clientes y podría aumentar sus ventas mejorando así sus ingresos. Esta es la razón por la cual solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL  para comprar mercadería de tienda tales como: aceite, arroz, golosinas, bebidas, macarrones, frijoles, sal,  detergente, y de más productos que permitan atraer a más clientes. De esta forma espera lograr su sueño de dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida, diferente a la que actualmente tienen.
texts.en:
María Gladis is 38 years old and lives in a house on her property together with her husband and her 14-year-old child, who is in school. 

For several years María has made a living in the business of her general store. Her life partner helps with the household expenses with the income he makes working the land, as he makes his living in agriculture. The two work hard to get their child ahead. For them it is the most thing in life and they want to give him better opportunities in life than they had. 

This business is her main source of income. As such it is very important to keep it active and continue pursuing the benefits, which, up until now, she has been satisfied with. She has a few regular customers who are very satisfied with the service she offers. She also has had many good references through her neighbors because she is an honest and hard working woman in addition to being very dedicated to her work. 

She has thought a lot about how to increase her income and has come to the conclusion that the best way to do so is to invest in merchandise for her store. In this way she will be able to attract more customers and therefor increase her sales as well as her income. This is why she is requesting a loan with INTEGRAL to purchase merchandise for her store, such as oil, rice, sweets, drinks, macaroni, beans, salt, detergent and other products that will allow her to attract more customers. In this way she hopes to achieve her dream of giving her family a better quality of life, distinct from what they currently have.

loans.use: to buy oil, sweets, drinks, macaroni, beans, salt, detergent, etc.

loans.name: Merlín Arely

texts.es: Merlín Arely, habita en casa alquilada, junto con su esposo de 27 años  y su hija de 4 años de edad. Merlín trabaja muy duro para sacar adelante a su familia, ya que los ingresos percibidos por el trabajo de carpintería de su esposo no logran cubrir las principales necesidades de la familia. Gracias a su facilidad en los negocios, desde hace varios años, se dedica al comercio de ropa de manera ambulante. Vende variedad de ropa para bebés y para adultos. De esta forma, colabora con la economía del hogar. Su sueño y el de su esposo es dar a su hija mejores condiciones de vida, diferentes a las que ellos han tenido acceso. Todo esto, motiva a Merlín a trabajar con mucho entusiasmo para continuar llevando el sustento a su hogar y lograr mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia. Como toda mujer emprendedora ha tomado la decisión de invertir en su negocio en la compra de mercadería como: ropa para bebés, ropa para adultos, etc. para dicha inversión solicita este préstamo a INTEGRAL ya que no cuenta con los recursos económicos necesarios. Considera que de esta forma podrá mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Merlín Arely lives in a rented house with her husband, 27, and her four-year-old daughter.  Merlín works very hard to get her family ahead because her husband's income as a carpenter does not cover the family's main necessities.

Thanks to her gift for business, for several years she has sold clothing as a street vendor.  She sells a variety of clothing for babies and adults.  This way she helps with the household finances.  Her dream and her husband's is to give their daughter better living conditions, different from the ones they had.   All this motivates Merlín to work enthusiastically to continue supporting her household and manage to improve her quality of life and that of her family.

Like all enterprising women, she has made the decision to invest in her business, buying merchandise such as baby clothing, adult clothing, etc.  She is asking INTEGRAL for a loan for this investment because she doesn't have the economic resources necessary.  She considers that this way she will be able to improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy baby clothing, adult clothing, etc.

loans.name: María Martina

texts.es: María Martina de sesenta y siete años de edad vive junto a su hijo en casa propia, ella posee una pupuseria vende pupusas de frijol con queso, revuelta,queso entre otras, tiene varios años de tener el negocio y está ubicado en su residencia en un lugar muy concurrido de personas, es  muy conocida en toda la zona y tiene mucha clientela, pues las pupusas que elabora son las más ricas, de primera calidad y con el servicio más rápido; María es una mujer visionaria, se ha propuesto cumplir cada una de sus metas y su avanzada edad no es un obstáculo, quiere acrecentar el negocio y necesita invertir en insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor,queso, chicharron, frijol, gas propano, etc. María Martina tiene buen record crediticio y es muy responsable, ella sabe que podrá saldar la deuda en el periodo establecido y a la vez tiene la seguridad que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: María Martina is 77 years old and lives at home with her son. She owns a stand where she fell pupusas (made out of maiz dough) made with beans, and cheese mixed with other cheeses. She has been in this business for many years which is located in her home. It is frequented by clientele and is well known in her area since she makes the most delicious pupusas out of quality products and fast service. María is a visionary woman. She has proposed of accomplishing all of her goals and age is not an obstacle for her. She wants to grow her business but needs to invest in more materials which is why he is requesting INTEGRAL a loan to buy corn, beans, propane gas, etc. María Martina has good credit and is very responsible. She knows she can pay back the loan and has confidence in offering her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: wholesale corn, cheese, pork rinds, propane gas.

loans.name: Marcela

texts.es: Marcela  de sesenta y cinco años de edad vive junto a sus hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de granos básicos y gas propano, tiene varios años de dedicarse a este negocio y es muy conocida por toda la zona, se ha hecho de mucha clientela, las personas las prefieren porque siempre tiene lo que necesitan todo de calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es excelente Marcela se caracteriza por su gran amabilidad; es una mujer honesta, responsable pero sobre todo muy humilde, está totalmente entregada a su labor pues es lo que más le gusta realizar, quiere ver crecer el negocio y está dispuesta a lograrlo, tiene la idea de invertir en insumos pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, por mayor y gas propano. Marcela tiene buenas referencias crediticias, está segura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez podrá ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Marcela is 65 years old and lives with her children. She sells basic grains and propane gas. She has been in this business for many years and is well-known in her area. She has a large clientele and they prefer her because she always has what they need. She offers quality products, at reasonable prices, and offers excellent service. Marcela is characterized for her friendliness, being an honest woman, responsible, and above all being very humble. She is completely dedicated to her work because it is what she likes to do. She wants her business to grow and has the drive to do so. She wants to invest in more materials but lacks the funds which is why she is requesting INTEGRAL a loan to buy wholesale basic grains and propane gas. Marcela had positive references when it comes to her credit and she is sure she can pay back the loan and offer her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: buy wholesale basic grains and propane gas

loans.name: Ingris Yaneth

texts.es: Ingris Yaneth no tuvo la oportunidad de contar con la educación académica que todo niño y niña deberían tener.  Esto la llevo a aprender un oficio, el cual es lo que le da de comer a ella y a su familia en la actualidad. Tiene 21 años de edad y habita junto a su esposo y sus hijos los cuales son la principal motivación de Ingris para continuar trabajando. Ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de hermosas hamacas.
