Elabora variedad de tamaños de hamacas a diferentes precios. Con este negocio es como logra llevar el sustento a su hogar ya que ella es uno de los principales soportes económicos de su hogar. Es muy conocida en la zona donde habita y muchas personas están agradecidas y satisfechas con el servicio que ofrece. Tiene algunos clientes fijos. Muchas veces sus clientes le encargan el producto con anticipación. Su deseo es continuar percibiendo los frutos de este negocio ya que es una de las principales fuentes de ingresos con la que cuenta. En vista de lo anterior ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio de hamacas, con el fin de dar un impulso a las ventas por medio del incremento de mercadería. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de la materia prima necesaria (hilos) y para el pago de mano de obra  para la elaboración de las hamacas, prevé que de esta forma logrará un incremento en las ventas y en los ingresos, lo cual le permitirá cancelar la deuda y continuar llevando el sustento a su hogar.
texts.en: Ingris Yaneth did not have the opportunity to go to school and get an education the way every child should. Instead, she works and at the moments that is how she feeds her family. She is 21 years old, lives with her husband, and children who are her main motivation when it comes to working. For a living she makes and sells beautiful hammocks. She makes hammocks of all different sizes and sells them at various prices. With this business she is able to maintain her family since she is one of main financial contributors of her household. She is well known in her area and many people are happy and satisfied with the service she offers. She has some stable clients. Many clients make orders with anticipation. Her wish is to continue receiving income from this business since it is one of the main sources of income she counts on. Taking all of this into account she decided to request this loan to INTEGRAL to invest in her hammock business and increase sales by having more hammocks to sell.  She will use the loan to buy material (thread) and pay labor for producing the hammocks. She will use the extra income to pay off the loan and continue supporting her home.

loans.use: buy material (thread) and pay labor for producing the hammocks

loans.name: Juan Jose

texts.es: Juan José vive con sus hijos en casa propia, él se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene muchos años de trabajar en este negocio y ha ganado mucha experiencia por eso obtiene cosechas favorables para su venta, su terreno está ubicado en un lugar de mucha incidencia agrícola y comercia en todas las zonas aledañas, tiene mucha clientela pues todas las personas le compran porque saben que lo que comercia es de muy buena calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es excelente; Juan es un hombre ejemplar muy trabajador dispuesto a aprovechar  cada oportunidad que se representa para poder llegar al éxito, quiere aumentar sus ganancias, pero para eso aumentará la producción, necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, fertilizante, herbicida, herramienta, etc. Juan José tiene buenas referencias crediticias y tiene la certeza que podrá cancelar el financiamiento y a la vez ofrecerle a su familia un futuro más prospero
texts.en: Juan José lives with his children in his own home. He works in agriculture, more specifically, the cultivation of corn and beans. He has been working in this business for many years and has gained a lot of experience, thus obtaining good harvests to sell. His land is located in an agricultural area and he sells his produce in the surrounding areas. He has a lot of customers because they know that his products are very high quality, the prices are affordable and the service is excellent. Juan is an exemplary man, a hard-worker who takes advantage of every opportunity in order to be successful. He wants to increase his earnings and will need the capital to be able to increase production. For this reason, he requests an INTEGRAL loan that will allow him to buy corn and bean seeds, fertilizers, herbicide, tools, etc. Juan José has good credit references and is sure that he will be able to pay the loan back and offer his family a more prosperous future.

loans.use: corn and bean seeds, fertilizers, herbicide and tools.

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es: Julio Cesar de cuarenta y cuatro años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos en casa propia; él se dedica el cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene muchos años de dedicarse a la agricultura pues es lo que más le gusta y lo que le ayuda a sostener el hogar, ha ganado mucha experiencia en este rubro, siempre logró los mejores resultados en sus siembras, el terreno está ubicado en una zona de incidencia agrícola cerca del lugar donde reside, comercia en todos los alrededores y tiene mucha clientela pues saben que todo lo que vende es de primera calidad y a precio accesible además el servicio es inigualable; Julio es un hombre honesto, trabajador, muy activo siempre está a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que lo ayuden a salir adelante con lo que se necesita, quiere invertir en el negocio por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, herramienta, etc. Julio Cesar tiene experiencia crediticia espera poder cancelar la deuda y a la vez darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en: Julio Cesar, 44 years old, lives with his wife and their children in their own home. He cultivates corn and beans. He has been working in agriculture for many years, he loves doing it and it helps him take care of his family. He has gained a lot of experience in this area and has always had good harvests. His land is located in an agricultural zone close to his home. He sells his produce in the surrounding areas and has many customers, as they know he always sells the best quality produce at affordable prices and the service is unbeatable. Julio is an honest man, a hard-worker, and very active. He always watches out for new opportunities that will help him get ahead when he needs it. He wants to invest in his business and requests a loan from INTEGRAL that would allow him to purchase corn and bean seeds, tools, etc. Julio Cesar has taken out loans before and he hopes to repay the loan and at the same time, give his family a better life.

loans.use: corn and bean seeds and tools

loans.name: Sonia Sarai

texts.es: Sonia Sarai vive junto a sus hijos en casa propia, ella se dedica a la venta de comida a la vista, desayunos y almuerzos, tiene en variedad, sopas, carnes, ensaladas, plátanos, frijoles, arroz entre otros,  su negocio está ubicado en el lugar de su residencia y tiene varios años de tenerlo, es muy conocido en la zona porque elabora los platillos más exquisitos,  se hecho de mucha clientela pues en el comedor de Sonia siempre encuentran lo que necesitan todo elaborado con material de primera calidad, con mucho higiene y a precios accesibles además el servicio es rápido; es una mujer emprendedora dispuesta a cumplir sus sueños, quiere alanzar el éxito y trabajara duro hasta lograrlo, necesita invertir en insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar carnes, granos básicos, embutidos, lácteos, verduras, bebidas, etc. Sonia Saria tiene buenas referencias crediticias y está seguro que podrá pagar la deuda y a la vez le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Sonia Sarai lives with her children in her own house.  She sells "comida a la vista" [dishes prepared in view of the customer], breakfast, and lunch.  She has a variety of soups, meat, salads, bananas, beans, and rice, among other things.

Her business is located in her house and she has had it for several years.  She is very well known in the area because she makes the most delicious dishes.  Sonia has gained a lot of customers because in her dining room they always find what they need, all made of top-quality ingredients, hygienically, and at affordable prices.  In addition, the service is fast.

She is an enterprising woman ready to achieve her dreams.  She wants to achieve success and she will work hard until she does.

She needs to invest in supplies so she is asking INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow her to buy meat, basic grains, sausage, dairy products, vegetables, beverages, etc.

Sonia Sarai has good credit references and is sure she will be able to repay the debt as well as give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy meat, basic grains, sausages, dairy products, vegetables, and beverages.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es: María Elena vive junto a sus hijos en casa propia, ella se dedica a la agricultura específicamente cultivo de granos básicos, tiene muchos años de dedicarse a este rubro y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia que le ayuda a mantener las mejores cosechas, su terreno está ubicado cerca de su residencia, comercia en todos los alrededores de la zona se levanta desde muy temprano pues sabe que a quien madruga Dios le ayuda, cuenta con mucha clientela pues saben que todo lo que vende es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es inigualable siempre trata muy bien a las personas; María es una mujer emprendedora dispuesta a trabajar duro para cumplir sus sueños, uno de ellos es acrecentar sus ventas pero para ello necesita invertir por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, herramienta, fertilizante, etc. María Elena es responsable, tiene buenas referencias de pago, sabe que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez darle a su familia una mejor vida.
texts.en: María Elena lives at home with her children. She is a farmer and grows basic grains. She has been farming for many years and has gained much experiance that helps her maintain and grow better crops. Her land is located close to her home. She sells in all the outskirts of her area. She wakes up very early since she knows that God helps those who rise early. She has a large clientele since she sells quality products, at reasonable prices, and offers unbeatable service. She treats her clientele very well. María Elena is a driven woman, willing to work hard to accomplish her dreams. One of them is to increase her sales and in order to do that she needs to invest in more supplies which is why she is requesting INTEGRAL a loan to buy corn and bean seeds, tools, fertilizer, etc. María Elena is responsible, has positive references, knows she can pay back the loan, and at the same time offer her family is better quality of life.

loans.use: buy corn and bean seeds, tools, fertilizer, etc.

loans.name: Jose Santos

texts.es: José Santos vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos en casa propia; ella se dedica al cultivo de maíz, la agricultura es su fuerte, tiene muchos años  de tener el negocio la experiencia que ha ganado le ayuda a mantener las mejores cosechas, es un gran vendedor comercia en todos los alrededores de la zona y se ha hecho de mucha clientela, las personas lo prefieren porque siempre tiene lo que ellos necesitan a precios realmente accesibles además el servicio es muy bueno; José es un hombre emprendedor, siempre está a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que le ayuden a buscar un futuro más próspero quiere llegar al éxito por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, fertilizante, insecticida y herramienta. José Santos tiene buenas referencias crediticias y gran capacidad de pago está seguro que podrá cancelar la deuda y a la vez le dará a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en: José Santos lives with his partner and children in their own home. He grows corn and agriculture is his forte. He has many years of experience which has helped him maintain and grow better crops.  He sells in all of the outskirts of his area and has lots of clientele. Customers prefer him since he has what they need at reasonable prices and offers them good service. José is a dedicated man and always on the lookout for new opportunities which will offer him a prosperous life. He wants to succeed therefore he is requesting INTEGRAL a loan to buy corn seeds, fertilizer, insecticides, tools, etc. José has good references about his credit and has the ability to pay off the loan and offer his family a fulfilling life.

loans.use: buy corn seeds, fertilizer, insecticides, tools, etc

loans.name: Maria Julia

texts.es: María Julia vive junto a su compañero de vida e hijos en casa propia, ella se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de maíz, tiene varios años de dedicarse a este rubro y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia valiosa que le ayuda a obtener las mejores cosechas, el terreno está ubicado en una zona de mucha incidencia agrícola, comercia en todos los alrededores de la zona, se ha hecho de mucho clientela pues todo lo que comercia es de muy buena calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es excelente; María es una mujer trabajadora, honesta y visionaria, siempre está aprovechando las oportunidades que se le presentan pues saben que eso le ayudara a alcanzar el éxito, en la última cosecha tuvo pérdidas y quiere recuperarse por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, fertilizante, insecticida y herramienta. María Julia tiene buen record crediticio y buenas referencias crediticias tiene la certeza de cancelar el crédito y a la vez podrá darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en: María Julia lives with her life partner and children in their own home. For a living she grows corn. She has many years of experience which helps her yield better crops. The land is located in an area of lots of vegetation. She sells in the outskirts of the area. She has gained lots of clientele since she sells quality products, at reasonable prices, and offers excellent service. María is a hard-working, honest, and visionary woman since she always takes advantage of opportunities that present themselves since she knows they will help her succeed. She had losses in her last crop and wants to make up those losses by requesting  INTEGRAL a loan to buy corn seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, tools, etc. María Julia has good credit and positive references. She also has confidence in paying back the loan and offering her family a fulfilling life.

loans.use: buy corn seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, tools, etc

loans.name: Joselo Ernesto

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Virgen Del Rosario se reúne cada quince días en Colorado del Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. En este sitio la mayoría de los habitantes se dedican a la fabricación de botones de tagua, artesanía y comercio en general.

Aquí conversamos con el señor Joselo, tiene 33 años, está casado y de esta relación tiene dos hijos de 8 y 3 años de edad, la mayor estudia en escuela, su esposa una muy buena ama de casa y además también le ayuda en su trabajo.

Nuestro amigo tiene un torno (máquina para cortar tagua) con la que elabora los botones pero en forma cruda, nos cuenta don Joselo que todos los fines de semana él lleva lo que ha elaborado a la ciudad de Manta y entrega sus productos a comerciantes los mismos que se encargan de exportar estos productos a otros países donde les dan el acabado para luego ser comercializados. Trabaja de lunes a viernes hasta ocho horas por día, trabaja solo o con la ayuda de su esposa ya que no es muy grande su fábrica, la materia prima la consigue en su localidad en un deposito que le deja a buen precio.

Este crédito lo va a utilizar en comprar tagua para la fabricación de los botones. Está en el Banco Comunal desde hace tres años y le gusta porque los créditos son rápidos.
 
Su sueño es seguir creciendo en su negocio.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank "Virgen del Rosario" meets every 15 days in Colorado, which is located in the canton of Montecristi. This area is known for its rich pre-colonial culture and its handicrafts that are recognized on a national and international level. Most of the residents of this area engage in the manufacture of tagua buttons, handicrafts, and trade in general.

The staff of Fundación ESPOIR spoke with Sr. Joselo. He is 33 years old, married, and has two children (ages 8 and 3). The older child is in school. His wife is an excellent homemaker and also helps with his business.

Joselo owns a lathe (a machine used to cut the tagua) for making buttons in crude form. Every weekend, Don Joselo takes everything he produces to the city of Manta, where they are delivered to traders who are in charge of exporting these items to other countries so that the finishing touches can be added before the products are sold. Joselo works eight hours a day, Monday through Friday. He either works alone or with the help of his wife since he does not have a large operation. The raw material that he uses comes from a warehouse in town that sells it for a good price.

This loan will be used to buy tagua for making buttons. Joselo has been with his Communal Bank for three years and likes being a member because the loans are issued quickly. His dream is to continue growing his business.

loans.use: to buy "tagua" (a natural ivory substitute) for making buttons.

loans.name: Omar Antonio

texts.es: Omar Antonio de diecinueve años de edad vive junto a su familia, el de dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene varios años de dedicarse a este rubro  y se ha hecho de mucha clientela, las personas saben que lo que vende Omar es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es excelente; Omar es un joven trabajador dispuesto a salir adelante, es visionario y sabe lo que quiere por eso trabaja duro día con día para alcanzar su sueño, en la última cosecha tuvieron pérdidas por lo que desean recuperarse y mejorar en esta temporada de siembra, necesita invertir en insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, fertilizante, insecticida, herramientas, etc. Omar Antonio no tiene experiencia crediticia pero tiene excelentes referencias personales, él sabe que podrá pagar la deuda y además darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Omar Antonio, 19 years old, lives with his family and cultivates corn and beans for a living. He has been working in this field for a few years and has many customers. His customers know that Omar's products are the best quality, sold at affordable prices and the service is excellent. Omar is a young hard-working man who wants to get ahead in life. He looks to the future and knows what he wants, which motivates him to work hard day after day to achieve his dreams. During the last harvest, he had losses that he wants to make up for and improve during this planting season. He needs to invest in corn and bean seeds, fertilizer, insecticide and tools, which is why he is asking for a loan from INTEGRAL. Omar Antonio does not have a credit history but he has excellent personal references. He knows that he can pay back the loan and give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: purchase corn and bean seeds, fertilizer, insecticide and tools

loans.name: Julio Antonio

texts.es: Julio Antonio vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos, él se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene varios años de dedicarse al rubro y su esposa le ayuda también han adquirido mucha experiencia y todo lo que cosechan da buenos resultados, comercia en todas las zonas aledañas a donde está el terreno, ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo lo que comercía es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es inigualable; Julio Antonio es un hombre honesto, trabajador siempre a la expectativas de nuevas oportunidades, sabe que por medio de éstas podrá alcanzar el éxito, en la temporada de siembra pasada se tuvieron algunas perdidas debido a las lluvias, pero quiere recuperarse y necesita de inversión, por eso solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, fertilizante, insecticida, herramienta etc. Julio Antonio tiene capacidad de  pago y sabe que cancelará el financiamiento con éxito y a la vez le dará a su familia una mejor vida.
texts.en:
Julio Antonio lives with his life partner and his children.  He works in agriculture, specifically growing rice and beans.  He has been working in the area for several years and his wife also helps him.  Also, they have acquired a lot of experience, and everything they harvest gives good results.

He sells in all the neighboring areas where he has his plot of land.  He has a lot of customers because people know that everything he sells is of top quality and at affordable prices.  In addition, the service is unequaled.

Julio Antonio is an honest and hardworking man who is always waiting for new opportunities.  He knows that with them he will be able to be successful.  In the last planting season he had some losses because of the rain, but he wants to recover and he needs an investment.  This is why he is asking INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow him to buy corn seed, beans, fertilizer, insecticide, tools, etc.

Julio Antonio is able to pay and he knows that he will repay the loan successfully and give his family a better life at the same time.

loans.use: to buy corn seed, beans, fertilizer, insecticide, and tools.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy ladies' shoes

loans.name: Balmore Galileo

texts.es: Balmore Galileo se dedica al cultivo de cereales especialmente de maíz y maicillo. Tiene mucha experiencia cultivando la tierra, aprendió a ganarse la vida de la agricultura desde que era niño, debido a que no contó con la oportunidad de ir a una escuela como otros niños. Sus padres le enseñaron a cultivar la tierra y es así como ahora en día se gana el pan de cada día.   Habita en casa de su propiedad junto con sus hijos los cuales ya son mayores de edad y le ayudan en la agricultura. Cada año repite la misma dinámica  de sembrar, cosechar y poner a la venta una parte de esta. Es así como lleva el sustento a su hogar y puede ir satisfaciendo las necesidades de su familia. Tiene algunos clientes fijos los cuales dan buenas referencias de su persona y de su trabajo. Muchas personas lo prefieren por ser un hombre trabajador, responsable, honesto y muy generoso. Solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de los insumos agrícolas (abonos, semillas, insecticidas, etc) necesarios para la siembra ya que la temporada ya comenzó y es necesario dar inicio a la siembra lo antes posible. Cabe mencionar que esta  actividad es muy importante para Balmore y su familia porque es una de las principales fuentes de ingresos con las cuales cuenta.  Desea poder obtener una cosecha abundante la cual le permita cancelar la deuda y continuar llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar.
texts.en: Balmore Galileo grows cereal for a living specifically corn and millet. He has many years of experience since he learned how to work in agriculture since he was a child. He was not able to go to school like the other children. His parents taught him how to cultivate the land and that is how he now feeds his family. He lives at home with his children which are grown up and help him in the fields. Every year they repeat the same sewing, picking, and selling cycle. This is how they are able to have an income and maintain household expenditures. He has some stable clients which give positive references about himself and his work. Many people prefer him because he is a hard-working, responsible, honest, and very generous man. He is requesting INTEGRAL a loan to buy agricultural materials(fertilizer, seeds, insecticides, etc.) necessary to sew since the growing season has just begun and it is necessary to begin as soon as possible. It is important to mention that this work is very important for Balmore and his family because it is one of the main sources of income on which they count on. He hopes to yield an abundant crop in order to pay back the loan and continue being able to feed his family every day.

loans.use: buy fertilizer, seeds, insecticides, etc

loans.name: Lucy Beatriz

texts.es: Lucy Beatriz tiene 29 años de edad y habita junto a su madre en casa heredada por un familiar. Por el momento no tiene hijos y se dedica únicamente a trabajar. Desde hace muchos años logro establecer u n puesto en el mercado central de la zona donde habita, en el cual comercializa variedad de productos para damas como: zapatos, sandalias, ropa interior, blusas, camisetas, faldas, pantalones, etc. Con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado mantener su negocio en marcha, ya que en el lugar donde comercializa existe una gran cantidad de negocios similares los cuales compiten por la misma clientela. Pero ella siempre trata de estar un paso delante de la competencia ya que siempre tiene variedad de productos los cuales atraen a los clientes  y cada vez son más las personas interesadas en visitar su negocio. Para darle mayor estabilidad a su negocio a decidido solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en mercadería como: zapatos, sandalias, blusas, faldas, vestidos, pantalones, y de más artículos que permitan atraer a más clientes, con el fin de incrementar las ventas y los ingresos, y así poder accesar a mejores oportunidades de vida diferentes a las que tienen.
texts.en:
Lucy Beatriz, 29, lives with her mother in a house inherited by a relative.  At the moment she doesn't have children and she only works.

Many years ago she was able to set up a stall in the main market of the area where she lives, where she sells a variety of products for women such as shoes, sandals, underwear, blouses, t-shirts, skirts, pants, etc.  She has managed to keep her business going with a lot of effort because where she sells there are a lot of similar businesses that compete for the same customers.  But she always tries to be one step ahead of the competition because she has a variety of products that attract the customers, and more people all the time are interested in visiting her business.

To make her business more stable she has decided to ask Integral for a loan to invest in merchandise such as shoes, sandals, blouses, skirts, dresses, pants, and other articles that will allow her to attract more customers.  Her goal is to increase her sales and income to be able to have better opportunities in life different from what she has.

loans.use: to buy shoes, sandals, blouses, skirts, dresses, pants, etc.

loans.name: Nora Nicolasa

texts.es: Nora Nicolasa de  47 años de edad, habita en su propia casa junto a su esposo. Sus hijos son mayores de edad y ya hicieron sus hogares.  Ella se dedica a los  negocios desde hace mucho tiempo. Su negocio consiste en la venta de productos de belleza por catalogo, como: lociones y cosméticos. Además de este negocio y también se dedica a la elaboración  y venta de ricos tamales y bebidas endulzadas.  Posee algunos clientes fijos  y es muy preferida en la zona,  ya que ella siempre trata de mantener variedad de productos de tal forma que los clientes siempre encuentren lo que buscan. Es una mujer muy luchadora, trabajadora, responsable y carismática. La ubicación del negocio es muy estratégica ya que se encuentra en una zona muy transitada y concurrida por muchas personas. Su negocio es muy importante, ya que es una de las principales fuentes de ingresos y desea mantenerlo activo por mucho más tiempo. Su deseo es hacer algunas mejoras en su hogar de residencia por lo que decidió hacer  este credito a INTEGRAL para que le ayuden en la construcción de un pequeño cuarto que quiere construir en su hogar de residencia. La inversión la hará en la compra de materiales de construcción como: Láminas, cemento, ladrillos, arena, etc. Confía que con los frutos de su negocio y con la ayuda de esta institución logrará mejorar sus condiciones de vida y podrá continuar llevando el sustento a hogar.
texts.en:
Nora Nicolasa is 47 years of age, and lives in her own house with her husband. Her children are adults and have their own homes. She has been involved in her business for many years, which involves the sale of catalog beauty products such as lotions and cosmetics. In addition to this business she also prepares and sells delicious tamales and sweet drinks. She has a number of regular customers and is sought-after in the area, as she always tries to have a variety of products so that her customers can always find what they’re looking for. 

Nora Nicolasa is a real fighter, and is hard-working, responsible and charismatic. Her business is located in a strategic area which is frequented by many people. Her business is very important as it is one of her main sources of income, and she wants to make sure that it continues for a long time. 

Nora Nicolasa’s dream is to make some improvements to her home, and she has decided to ask for this loan from INTEGRAL to help build a small room at home. She plans to invest the loan in construction materials such as metal sheets, cement, bricks, sand, etc. She trusts that the results of her business and the help of this institution will enable her to improve her living conditions and allow her to continue supporting her household.

loans.use: To buy metal sheets, cement, bricks, sand, etc.

loans.name: Berta América

texts.es: Berta América tiene 51 años de edad y  habita  en casa de su propiedad junto con su esposo y dos hijos, los cuales se encuentran estudiando. Berta  es una mujer emprendedora y luchadora. Hace algunos años se decidió en poner un pequeño negocio en cual consiste en la comercialización de variedad de piñatas, el cual ha logrado mantener activo por  varios años. Cuenta con mucha clientela ya que para Berta lo más importante son los clientes, siempre los atiende con una sonrisa y mucha amabilidad, razón por la cual se ha ganado la confianza de muchos en la zona y además porque siempre tiene lo que los clientes buscan. El negocio está ubicado en el mercado central de la zona donde habita lugar  que es muy transitado en especial el negocio de Berta ya que sus productos llaman la atención y muchos quieren comprar las piñatas.  Ha decidido invertir en su negocio en la compra de mercadería, es decir, en la compra de variedad de piñatas, últimos diseños al por mayor  con el fin de atraer a más clientes que le permitan mejorar sus niveles de ventas e ingresos.  Es por esta razón que se motivo en solicitar este crédito a INTEGRLAL  ya que no posee los recursos  económicos para hacer la inversión por su cuenta. Confía que de esta manera logrará cumplir su sueño de mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia.
texts.en: Berta América is 51 years old and lives with her husband and two children in their own home. Her children go to school. Berta is an enterprising and hard-working woman. A few years ago, she decided to start a small business selling piñatas. She has managed to keep it going for a few years now. She has many customers and they are very important to Berta. She always tends to them with a smile and much friendliness, which has helped her earn their confidence. She always has what her customers are looking for. Her business is located in the central market and gets a lot of traffic, especially Berta's booth because her products get people's attention and many people want to buy piñatas. She has decided to invest in her business by purchasing more merchandise to increase the variety of piñatas and get the latest wholesale designs to attract more customers. This will help her increase her sales and income. For this reason, she is motivated to take out a loan through INTEGRAL, as she does not have the economic resources to make the investment by herself. She trusts that in this way she will be able to fulfill her dream and improve the quality of life for herself and her family.

loans.use: purchase piñatas.

loans.name: Rafael Vicente

texts.es: Rafael Vicente a su edad tiene la bendición de contar con su madre viva, ella vive en su casa, él la cuida. Se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de maíz, ha dedicado toda su vida a este trabajo y ya tiene experiencia muy valiosa,  desde muy pequeño ha trabajado duro, se levanta desde muy temprano a laborar pues es su fuente de ingresos que lo ayuda a llevar el pan a la mesa día con día, para él es muy importante tener siempre las mejores cosechas porque de esta forma comerciara en los alrededores producto de calidad, ya tiene mucha clientela pues todo lo que vende tiene buen precio y el servicio es excelente; Rafael sin duda es un hombre ejemplar con muchas ganas de sobresalir, quiere ganarse un futuro más próspero por eso se esforzara el doble, ha pensado en aumentar la producción pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, fertilizante, herbicida, insecticida, herramienta y pagar personas que le ayuden. Rafael Vicente tiene buenas referencias de pago y está seguro que tiene la capacidad de cancelar la deuda y a la vez darle a su familia una vida mejor.
texts.en: Rafael Vicente is blessed that at his age his mother is still alive; she lives with him and he cares for her. He devotes his time to farming, specifically growing maize. He has done so all his life and has a lot of valuable experience. He has worked hard since he was very small, getting up very early to work and put bread on the table every day. It is important that he has the best crops so that he can sell quality produce in the local area. He has many customers because everything he sells comes with a reasonable pricetag and excellent customer service. Without a doubt, Rafael is an example to us all: so eager to excel and build a more prosperous future that he will work twice aas hard. He wants to increase production but needs capital to do so, and therefore asks INTEGRAL for a loan to buy seed corn, fertilizer, herbicide, insecticide, tool and pay people to help. Rafael Vicente has good references and is confident that he can repay the debt and give his family a better life.

loans.use: To buy seed corn, fertilizer, weedkiller, insecticide, and tools, and to pay labourers who help with the planting

loans.name: Jose Alberto

texts.es: José Alberto de treinta y ocho años de edad vive junto a su grupo familiar en casa propia, él se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos, maíz, frijol, entre otros ya tiene más de diez años de dedicarse a este trabajo y sigue con el mismo entusiasmo desde el primer día que empezó  a trabajar, pues a pesar de que su labor le ayuda con los gastos del hogar José ama lo que hace, siempre se esfuerza por obtener las mejores cosechas y recibe el apoyo de toda su familia, el terreno está ubicado cerca de su residencia y comercia en todos las zonas aledañas, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues siempre posee todo de calidad  a precios accesibles además de un excelente servicio; José es un hombre motivado, trabajador y con mucho sueños por alcanzar uno de ellos es acrecentar el negocio por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz por mayor, fertilizante, herbicida, etc. José Alberto tiene buen record crediticio y está seguro que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez ofrecerle a su familia la vida plena que se merecen.
texts.en: José Alberto is 38 years old and lives with his family in their own home. For a living he grows basic grains, corn, beans, and other things. He has been a farmer for more than 10 years and continues with the same enthusiasm he had since his first day of work. Aside from the fact that his work will pay off household expenditures José loves what he does. He always tries his hardest to yield the best crops and receives all the support from his family. The land is located close to his residence. He sells in all of the outskirts of his area. He has lots of clientele since he offers quality products, at reasonable prices, and offers excellent service. José is a motivated, hard working man with many dreams to fulfill and one of them is to grow his business which is why he is requesting INTEGRAL a loan to buy wholesale corn seeds, fertilizer, herbicides, etc. José has good credit and he is sure he can pay back the loan and offer his family the fulfilling life they deserve.

loans.use: wholesale corn seeds, fertilizer, herbicides, etc

loans.name: Adriana

texts.es: Adriana de 47 años de edad,  habita en casa de su propiedad junto con sus hijos. Su esposo falleció hace algunos años. Desde entonces ella es el principal sostén de su hogar.  Junto con la ayuda de sus hijos se dedica a la agricultura. Cada año repiten la tarea de sembrar maíz y maicillo ya que estos son los granos básicos mas cosechados en la zona donde habita.  Con mucha dedicación mantiene  sus cultivos y luego de sacar la cosecha  pone a la venta una parte de esta. Es así como se  gana la vida y lleva el pan de cada día a su hogar. Además de los ingresos percibidos de su trabajo en la agricultura también recibe una pensión, la cual le ayuda a ir sobreviviendo y llevando el sustento a su hogar.  Ella  es una mujer muy trabajadora y responsable tiene buenas referencias por parte de sus vecinos   ya que con el tiempo ha sabido ganarse la confianza de muchas personas que cada vez la prefieren más. Su sueño es poder dar a su querida familia  mejores oportunidades de vida  a las que tienen ya que viven en condiciones muy humildes que no les permiten poder accesar a una mejor calidad de vida. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de  los insumos agrícolas necesarios para la siembra como: Semillas, abonos, insecticidas, etc. ya que no puede esperar más tiempo para sembrar, debido a que la temporada para la siembra ya comenzó. Con la ayuda de Dios y de esta institución espera obtener una cosecha abundante la cual le permita cancelar el préstamo y continuar llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar.
texts.en:
Adriana is 47 years of age, and lives in her own house with her children. Her husband passed away several years ago, and since then she has been responsible for supporting her household. Along with help from her children, she works in agriculture. Each year they repeat the task of sowing corn and sorghum, as these are the basic grains most frequently harvested in the area where she lives. 

Adriana is very dedicated when working with her crops, and after harvesting them she sells part of the produce. This is how she earns a living and provides for her household. In addition to the income she gets from her agricultural work, she also receives a pension which helps her to survive and provide for her household. 

She is a hardworking, responsible woman with good references from her neighbors, as over time she has won the trust of many people who prefer her produce. Her dream is to be able to provide her family with better opportunities in life, as they live in very humble conditions which do not afford them a better quality of life. 

Adriana has decided to request this loan from INTEGRAL to buy the agricultural supplies she needs to plant her crops, such as seeds, compost, insecticides, etc. She cannot wait any longer to plant her crops as the sowing season has already begun. With the help of God and this institution she hopes to have an abundant harvest, which will allow her to repay the loan and continue providing for her household every day.

loans.use: To buy seeds, compost, insecticides, etc.

loans.name: María Rosalba

texts.es: María Rosalba habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su grupo familiar. Ella  se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos especialmente maíz y frijoles. Tiene mucho tiempo de dedicarse a esta actividad por lo que ya cuenta con mucha experiencia en el área. Sus vecinos dan buenas referencias de ella  puesto que con su amabilidad, honestidad y trabajo ha sabido ganarse la confianza de  muchas personas. Para ella  lo más importante es que su familia cuente con lo necesario para sobrevivir.  María no se cansa de trabajar ya que su deseo es ver a su familia en mejores condiciones de vida a las que ella ha tenido acceso. Día a día se levanta muy temprano para poder hacer las tareas del hogar y luego dedicarse a las tareas de la agricultura ya que esta actividad es su principal l fuente de ingresos. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir  en los insumos necesarios (semilla, venenos para plagas, abonos, etc.) para la siembra de los granos básicos que año con año cosecha. Espera y confía en Dios que logrará  resultados favorables que le permitirán mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia. Cabe mencionar que ella es el principal soporte económico de su hogar.
texts.en:
María Rosalba lives in her own house with her family. She works growing basic grains, mainly corn and beans. She has worked in this business for many years, and therefore has lots of experience in this area. Her neighbors give her good references as, with her friendly, honest and hard-working nature, she has won the trust of many people. 

The most important thing in María Rosalba’s life is making sure that her family has all it needs to survive. She does not tire from working, as her wish is to see her family enjoy better living conditions than those she had herself. Each day she gets up very early to do the housework, and then starts working in her agriculture business as this is her main source of income. 

María has decided to request this loan from INTEGRAL to buy the supplies she needs to sow the basic grains she harvests each year (seeds, insecticides, compost, etc.) She hopes and trusts in God that she will obtain favorable results that will allow her to improve her quality of life and that of her family. It is worth noting that she provides the main financial support for her household.

loans.use: To buy seeds, insecticides, compost, etc.

loans.name: Gerturde

texts.en:
Gerturde is 47 years old and is a widow with four children aged between 12 and 25 years old. She takes care of five relatives. She sells second-hand clothes for elders and children and she has five years of experience in this work. The hours of her business are from 8 a.m. to 6 p.m. every day except on Saturdays.

Gerturde has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to buy more second-hand clothes for elders and children for resale. With any profits, she will be able to save for her future, pay school fees for her children, and re-invest in her business.

loans.use: to buy more second-hand clothes for elders and children for resale.

loans.name: Union Pour Vaincre La Pauvreté Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe faisant partie du Banc Villageois "Union Pour Vaincre la Pauvreté" existe depuis le 9 avril 2011. Il est composé de trente trois femmes qui sont en bonne entente,qui habitent le même village et mènent comme activités principales le petit commerce et l'embouche ovine, bovine et caprine entre autres.

Madame Amy la responsable du groupe est âgée de 33 ans; elle est mariée mère de cinq enfants( trois garçons et deux filles); elle mène une activité de commerce de produits divers tels que l'encens,les parfums, savon..... depuis début 2012; elle fait parallèlement de l'embouche ovine.Sur la photo elle est debout à droite habillée en robe multicolore avec un foulard bleu et a pointé le doigt de la main droite vers le haut.

Elle reçoit ses produits de la ville voisine que lui envoie un parent et elle les revend dans son village.


Avec son prêt elle souhaite acheter une dizaine de moutons au marché hebdomadaire du village, qu'elle va engraisser et revendre après 6 mois ou pendant les périodes de fêtes.


Avec ses bénéfices, elle aide son mari dans la prise en charge de la famille et achète des habits pour les enfants de temps à autre.
texts.en:
This group, which is part of the Banc Villageois "Union Pour Vaincre la Pauvreté," has been in existence since April 9, 2011.  It comprises thirty-three women who get along well, live in the same village, and whose main activities are small retail business, as well as sheep, cow and goat fattening, among others.

Amy, the group's representative, is 33 years old.  She is married and the mother of five children (three boys and two girls).

Since the beginning of 2012, she has been selling various goods such as incense, perfumes, soap...  Additionally, she fattens sheep.  In the photo, she is standing in the right corner; she is wearing a multi-colored dress and a blue scarf, and she is raising her right hand.

She gets her goods from the closest city; one of her relatives sends them to her.  She then resells her merchandise in her village.

With her loan, she would like to buy ten sheep at the village's weekly market.  She will fatten them and resell them after six months or during the holiday season.

With the profits, she helps her husband to provide for the family and she sometimes buys clothes for her children.

loans.use: to buy and raise sheep for resale.

loans.name: María Elena

texts.es: María Elena se dedica a la venta de tamales desde hace mucho tiempo. Habita en condiciones muy sencillas y humildes junto a su hija la cual ya es mayor de edad y colabora con la economía del hogar. Es una mujer ejemplar la cual a sus 59 años continúa trabajando duramente para sacar adelante a su familia y ganarse el pan de cada día. Ella se dedica a la venta de tamales. Con su negocio logra percibir los ingresos con los cuales mantiene su hogar.No posee el servicio básico de luz eléctrica y las condiciones de su hogar son muy humildes, ya que no ha contado con la oportunidad de accesar a mejores condiciones de vida. Con mucha sencillez  se acerco a esta institución para solicitar este crédito el cual le permita invertir en la adquisición de los servicios básicos como la instalación de la luz eléctrica y para comprar laminas para su vivienda. Desea mejorar las condiciones de vida en las que habita y espera que con la ayuda de Dios y de esta institución su sueño se haga realidad.
texts.en: María Elena has made a living selling tamales for a long time. She lives in very simple and humble conditions with her daughter who is already of age and contributes to the household finances. She's an exemplary woman who, at her 59 years of age, continues working hard to get her family ahead and earn her daily bread every day. She makes a living selling tamales and with her business manages to receive income with which she supports her household. She doesn't have basic electric light service and her home's conditions are very humble since she hasn't had the opportunity to access better life conditions. With much simplicity she came to this institution to request a loan which will allow her to invest in acquiring basic services like the installation of electric light and buying corrugated metal sheets for her home. She would like to improve the living conditions in which she lives and hopes that with God's and this institution's help her dream will become a reality.

loans.use: to install electric light and buy corrugated metal sheets.

loans.name: Pc 2 Femmes Casamancaise Group

texts.fr:
Ce démembrement de groupe faisant partie d'un banc villageois été crée le 02/09/2008. il regroupe 19 femmes de même quartier et de quartiers environnants. Elles sont unies par des relations sociales communes et font la même activité qui est le commerce.

madame hassanatou (Assise à gauche de la photo, en écharpe grisâtre) est une femme mariée âgée de 46 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 6 enfants dont une fille de 29ans mariée et de 5 garçons.

Elle développe une activité de commerce de tissu et produits cosmétiques (lait de corps, parfums etc) depuis longtemps .

avec son nouveau crédit elle va renforcer sa marchandise citée ci-dessus quelle va revendre au niveau de son quartier.

les bénéfices générés par son activité son recyclés en capital pour mieux charger sa cantine mais également d'aider son mari dans la prise en charge de la famille.
texts.en:
This sub-group of a banc villageois [local credit association] was established on September 2, 2008. It brings together 19 women from the neighborhood and the surrounding area. They are united by common social connections and are involved in the same occupation, which is trade.

Mrs. Hassanatou (sitting at the left in the photo and wearing a grayish scarf) is a married, 46-year-old woman and the mother of six children: one 29-year-old daughter and five sons. She has been running a business selling fabrics and cosmetic products (body lotions, perfumes, etc.) for a long time.

With her new loan, Mrs. Hassanatou is going to increase her merchandise (fabrics and cosmetic products), which she is going to sell, retail, in her neighborhood.

The profits generated by her business are added to her capital in order to better stock her shop, but also to help her husband in taking care of the family.

loans.use: To purchase fabrics and cosmetic products (body lotions, perfumes, etc.).

loans.name: Affi

texts.fr:
Affi est une femme âgée de 43 ans. Elle est célibataire.  Elle a 2 enfants  qui vont à l’école. Le premier a 18 ans et le dernier a 12 ans.
Affi travaille comme revendeuse depuis 1990. Elle vend des produits cosmétiques pour tous clients au marché. Elle achète les produits à Lomé. Elle travaille seule. Au moment, sa difficulté principale est la rupture de stock.
Affi a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des produits cosmétiques. Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité.
Dans les prochaines années, Affi voudrait ouvrir une boutique. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, elle prévoit d’assurer un avenir radieux à ses enfants.
texts.en:
Affi is a 43 year old woman. She is single. She has 2 children who attend school. The elder is 18 and the younger 12 years old. Affi has worked in sales since 1990. She sells cosmetic products to a wide customer base in the market. She buys her products in Lomé, and she works alone. Currently, her main problem is running out of stock.
Affi needs this first loan with WAGES in order to purchase cosmetic products. She wants to invest in her business.
In the coming years, Affi would like to open a small store. She says that with her profits, she intends to ensure a bright future for her children.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetic products

loans.name: Griselda Consuelo

texts.es: Griselda Consuelo tiene 39 años de edad y habita junto a su hija de 15 años de edad la cual se encuentra estudiando. Hace algunos años logro establecer un puesto en cual vende variedad de artículos de primera necesidad como: cereales, productos de limpieza, aceite, sopas, café, harina de maíz, etc. Con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado mantener su negocio en marcha, y trabaja muy duro para continuar manteniéndolo activo, ya que es su principal fuente de ingresos  y de los frutos del mismo es como lleva el sustento a su hogar.  Es una mujer muy trabajadora la cual hace todo lo que esté en sus manos para llevar el pan de cada día a su hija. Su deseo es dar lo necesario a su hija para que pueda continuar estudiando y algún día pueda verla como toda una profesional con diferentes oportunidades a las que ella ha tenido. Con esta motivación se presento a INTEGRAL a solicitar este crédito para invertir en la adquisición de mercadería de tienda como: arroz, frijoles, aceite, bebidas, macarrones, café, productos de limpieza y de mas artículos que puedan atraer a más clientes y le permitan aumentar sus niveles de venta y de ingresos de tal forma que esto le permita cancelar la deuda y continuar llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar.
texts.en: Griselda Consuelo is 39 years old and lives with her 15-year-old daughter who is studying in school. Several years ago she managed to set up a stall from which she sells a variety of basic necessities like: cereals, cleaning products, oil, soap, coffee, corn flour, etc. With much effort she has managed to keep her business going and works very hard to continue keeping it up since it's her main source of income and from whose fruits she sustains her household. She's a very hardworking woman who does everything she can to put food on the table for her daughter every day. Her wish is to give what's necessary to her daughter so that she can continue studying and one day be able to see her as a professional with different opportunities than those which she herself has had. With this motivation she came to Integral to request this loan and invest it in acquiring merchandise for her store like: rice, beans, oil, drinks, macaroni, coffee, cleaning products and more items that can attract more customers and which will allow her to increase her sale's levels and income. In this way it will allow her to pay off her debt and continue putting food on the table.

loans.use: to buy: rice, beans, oil, drinks, macaroni, coffee, cleaning products, etc.

loans.name: Kossi

texts.fr:
Kossi est un homme âgé de 54 ans. Il est marié å une revendeuse. Il a 1 enfant âgé de 18 ans qui va à l’école.
Kossi travaille comme revendeur depuis 2009. Il vend des matelas, des chaises en plastique et divers autres articles pour tous clients dans sa boutique. Il achète les produits à Lomé. Il travaille avec sa sœur. Au moment, sa difficulté principale est le manque d’argent pour acheter plus de marchandises.
Kossi a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des matelas, des chaises en plastique et divers autres articles. Il veut réinvestir dans l’activité.
Dans les prochaines années, Kossi voudrait ouvrir une seconde boutique. Il dit qu’avec les profits, il prévoit d’assurer la scolarisation de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Kossi is a 54 year old man. He is married to a saleswoman. He has one 18 year old child, who attends school. Kossi has worked as a salesman since 2009. He sells mattresses, plastic chairs and various other items to a broad customer base in his small store. He buys his products in Lomé. He works with his sister.
Currently, his main problem is a lack of funds to purchase more merchandise. Kossi needs this first loan with WAGES in order to purchase mattresses, plastic chairs and various other items. He wants to invest in his business. In the coming years, Kossi would like to open a second small store. He states that, with his profits, he intends to cover the schooling costs for his child.

loans.use: to purchase mattresses, plastic chairs and various products.

loans.name: Rosa Emérita

texts.es: Rosa Emérita tiene 52 años de edad y habita en casa de su propiedad junto con sus hijos y esposo. Junto a su familia trabaja duramente para cubrir las principales necesidades de su hogar.  Ella es una mujer emprendedora la cual hace todo lo que esté en sus manos para llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar. Su esposo trabaja  haciendo viajes de materiales de construcción y los hijos le ayudan con el negocio.  Ella se dedica al cultivo de la tierra desde hace muchos años, junto a su grupo familiar  trabajan en la agricultura. Cada año cultivan maíz, y luego de sacar la cosecha ponen a la venta una parte de la misma. Además de esta actividad también posee una pequeña tiendita en su hogar de residencia, la cual logró  establecer con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación. Debido a que la temporada para la siembra ya comenzó y es necesario comenzar la  siembra lo antes posible, solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la comprar de los insumos agrícolas como: semillas, abonos, insecticidas, etc. los cuales son indispensables para obtener una cosecha favorable y así poder continuar llevando el sustento a su hogar y tratar de mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia poco a poco.
texts.en: Rosa Emérita is fifty-two years old and lives in a home that's her property with her children and husband. Together with her family she works hard to cover the main necessities of her household. She's an entrepreneurial woman who does everything she can to put food on the table every day. Her husband works making construction materials trips and their children help him with the business. She has made a living farming the earth for many years together with her family group that works farming. Each year they grow corn and later take the harvest and sell a part of it. In addition to this activity she also has a small store in her home which she managed to set up with a lot of effort and dedication. Because the sowing season has already begun it's necessary to begin sowing as soon as possible. She is requesting this loan from Integral to invest in the purchase of farming supplies like: seeds, fertilizer, insecticides, etc. These are indispensable for obtaining a favorable harvest and thus being able to continue supporting her household and trying to improve her and her family's living conditions little by little.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, insecticides, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous Group

texts.fr: La cliente, membre  de l’association de crédit  « Bonheur », est un entrepreneur très ambitieux, âgée de 43 ans, femme vivant seule(sans mari), mais  mère de 3 jeunes enfants qui étudient tous. Elle est vendeuse des denrées alimentaires. Son mari est inopinément décédé suite à une courte maladie. Elle installe ses marchandises dans des petits marchés, à son domicile et parfois sur le long de la rue donnant axer aux avenues. Elle commença son business par la vente de poissons (Mikeke) à provenance d’Uvira, et cela, avec son fonds propre reçu de ses amis. Alors, plus tard elle bénéficia un fond additionnel de crédit de 50$ de l’IMF Hekima. Il y a 2 ans révolus qu’elle exerce ces petites activités génératrices de revenus de ce genre. Cependant, elle vient de réaliser  3  cycles en profitant  du programme de microcrédit de l’IMF Hekima. L’insécurité dans l’intérieur de la province constitue une menace pour le développement de ses activités.  Ce nouveau crédit doit lui servir  de s’approvisionner avec  50 kg de riz, 50 kg de sucres, poissons, savons, etc.,  et le reste d’argent sera affecté dans la scolarité des enfants.  En plus, elle souhaite  voir ses enfants grandir, acheter une maison, une voiture.  La cliente remercie Hekima pour  ses actions dédiées de pauvres femmes pour leur émancipation économique et financière.  Il sied se signaler que certaines clientes portent leurs bébés.
texts.en:
The borrower, a member of the "Bonheur" (happiness) credit association is a highly ambitious entrepreneur. She is 43 years old, a woman living alone (without her husband), yet a mother of 3 young children who all attend school. She is a seller of foodstuffs. Her husband died unexpectedly after a short illness.
She offers her products in small markets, from her home and occasionally also along the streets leading to the main avenues. She began her business with the sale of fish (Mikeke) from Uvira, and she did this with her own capital gathered from her friends. Then, later on she received additional funds in the form of a $50 loan from the Hekima micro-finance institution. She has been undertaking small income-generating activities like these for the last 2 years now. However, she has just fulfilled three successive loans, benefiting from the microcredit program offered by Hekima.
The insecurity in the interior of the region constitutes a threat for the development of her business. This new loan will allow her to purchase 50kg of rice, 50kg of sugar, plus fish, soap, etc. The remainder of the money will be used to fund the children's schooling. Furthermore, she hopes to see the children grow up, and buy a house and a car. The borrower thanks Hekima for their focus on poor women and offering them economic and financial emancipation. It should be noted that some group members are holding their babies.

loans.use: to purchase 50kg of rice, 50kg of sugar, plus fish, soap, etc.

loans.name: Trinidad

texts.en: Trinidad is 49 years old, married, and has six children that live separately from them. She raises hogs to fatten and breed for future sale. Her husband is a farmer. They work hard to gain income for the family. She is now asking for a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy hog feed, vitamins and medicines for maintenance. She would like to improve her small business to earn funds to use in times of emergency.

loans.use: to buy hog feed, vitamins and medicines for maintenance

loans.name: Fidel

texts.en: Fidel is a widower with three grown children. The whole family lives in Isabela. For the last ten years, Fidel has been growing corn and rice. Fidel plans to use a loan of 15,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) to buy more seed and fertilizer for his farm. Fidel very much hopes to gain additional profit from his farming business in order to finish long-needed repairs on his home next year.

loans.use: to buy more seed and fertilizer for his farm.

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.en: Rosalina is 52 years old, married, and has three children. She has been running her business buying and selling vegetables for four years and earns about PHP 5,000 a month. Rosalina is aiming to increase her profits due to expensive basic commodities, allowances and a high electric bill. For that reason, she is asking for financial support in the amount of PHP 18,000 to buy additional vegetables, spices and root crops to sell. She believes that she can improve her business through the loan she requested and as she continues hard work.

loans.use: to buy additional vegetables, spices and root crops to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy raw ingredients to make viand (tasty food) and snacks

loans.name: Anonymous Group

texts.fr: La cliente, leader du groupe d’affaire « Mapatano », est un entrepreneur dynamique, âgée de 40 ans, mère de 8 jeunes enfants qui étudient tous. Elle est  vendeuse de pagnes (Bitenge). Son mari est aussi petit commerçant de divers. Elle installe ses marchandises au marché communal de Katindo. Elle commença son business avec son fonds propre, alors, plus tard elle bénéficia un fond additionnel de crédit de base de l’IMF Hekima. Il y a 4 ans révolus qu’elle exerce ces petites activités génératrices de revenus de ce genre. Cependant, elle vient de réaliser 8 cycles en profitant du programme de microcrédit de l’IMF Hekima. Ce nouveau crédit doit lui servir de s’approvisionner avec 10 doubles de pièces de pagnes (Bitenge),et le reste d’argent sera affecté dans le modeste investissement.  En plus, elle souhaite  voir ses enfants grandir et construire honorablement sa maison.  La cliente remercie Hekima pour ses actions dédiées de pauvres femmes pour leur émancipation économique et financière.
texts.en: The client, the leader of the Mapatano group, is a dynamic entrepreneur, 40 years old and mother of 8 children, who are all in school. She sells fabric (Bitenge). Her husband is also a retailer of diverse items. She sells her items from the community market in Katindo. She started the business with her own money, then later received additional funding from the microfinance institution Hekima. For the past four years, she has carried out these small revenue generating activities. She already completed eight loan cycles with Hekima's microcredit program. With this new loan, she will stock up by buying 10 double reams of fabric (Bitenge) and make other small investments in her business. She wishes to see her children grow up and to build a decent house. She thanks Hekima for its commitment to poor women and their economic and financial empowerment.

loans.use: to purchase 10 double reams of fabric (Bitenge)

loans.name: Rosa Del Pilar

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Virgen Del Rosario se reúne cada quince días en Colorado del Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. En este sitio la mayoría de los habitantes se dedican a la fabricación de botones de tagua, artesanía y comercio en general.

Aquí conocimos a la señora Rosa, tiene 34 años  de edad, es madre soltera de tres hijos de 15, 13 y  11 y años de edad que estudian en colegio y escuela. Ella vive en casa de sus padres. Lleva en el Banco Comunal tres  ciclos y le gusta por la ayuda que le dan con los créditos.

Ella es una muy buena ama de casa que para generar sus propios ingresos se dedica a la fabricación de botones hechos en tagua, para lo cual  tiene un torno (máquina para cortar tagua) con la que se elaboran los botones pero en forma cruda, productos que entregan en su sector a  comerciantes que llegan hasta este lugar a comprar para luego llevarlas a Manta para que estos sean enviados  al extranjero para que sean terminados. Trabaja todos los días y lleva en este negocio por casi dos años.

Ella está repitiendo el crédito y es para el mismo negocio ya que en este ciclo que paso el negocio no estuvo muy bueno por causa del invierno y casi no le quedo ganancias las cuales con este nuevo crédito espera recuperar ya que actualmente el negocio ha mejorado y seguirá mejor con el paso de los días, nos comenta que por esta situación tuvo dos atrasos en sus pagos pero que luego como pudo ella se puso al dia para así seguir recibiendo los créditos que para ella son muy importantes, ella va a comprar tagua que es la  materia prima para la fabricación de los botones. Lleva cuatro ciclos en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por las facilidades de pago.
 
Su sueño es tener una fábrica grande con mayor tecnología.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank "Virgen del Rosario" meets every 15 days in Colorado, which is located in the canton of Montecristi. This area is known for its rich pre-colonial culture and its handicrafts that are recognized on a national and international level. Most of the residents of this area engage in the manufacture of tagua buttons, handicrafts, and trade in general.

It is here that one can meet Sra. Rosa. She is 34 years old and a single mother of three children (ages 15, 13, and 11) who are attending school. Rosa lives at her parents' house. She has been with her Communal Bank for three loan cycles and enjoys the help that the loans have given her.

Rosa is an excellent homemaker, but she also generates her own income by manufacturing buttons out of tagua. She uses a lathe (a machine that cuts the tagua) for making buttons in crude form. The products are delivered to traders who come to her area to buy them before taking them to Manta, where they are shipped abroad for final processing. Rosa works every day and has been in business for almost two years.

She is repeating the loan process for the same business. During this past loan cycle, her business did not do very well because of the winter. She almost came away with no profits. Rosa hopes to recover with this new loan. Her business is currently improving with each passing day. Rosa says that her situation resulted in two delinquent payments, but she was able to get back on track so that she could continue receiving the loans that are very important to her. She will use the money to buy tagua, the raw material used for making the buttons. Rosa is now in her fourth loan cycle with her Communal Bank and enjoys the convenience of the payments. Her dream is to have a large factory with the latest technology.

loans.use: to buy "tagua" (a natural ivory substitute) for making buttons.

loans.name: Anonymous Group

texts.fr: La cliente, conseillère  de l’association de crédit  « Goshen », est un entrepreneur très courageuse, âgée de 32 ans, veuve, mère de 5 jeunes enfants qui étudient tous. Elle est vendeuse des denrées alimentaires (haricots, farines). Son mari est inopinément décédé suite à une courte maladie. Elle installe ses marchandises dans le petit marché sectoriel, parfois sur le long de la rue donnant axer aux avenues. Elle commença son business avec son fonds propre, alors fond issu de la vente de ses appareils (TV, radio, téléphone). Plus tard, elle bénéficia un fond additionnel de crédit de 50$ de l’IMF Hekima. Il y a 3 ans révolus qu’elle exerce ces petites activités génératrices de revenus de ce genre. Cependant, elle vient de réaliser  3  cycles en profitant  du programme de microcrédit de l’IMF Hekima. L’insécurité dans l’intérieur de la province constitue une menace pour le développement de ses activités.  Ce nouveau crédit doit lui servir  de s’approvisionner avec  2 sacs de haricots, et le reste d’argent sera affecté dans la scolarité des enfants.  En plus, elle souhaite  voir ses enfants grandir, construire honorablement une maison.  La cliente remercie Hekima pour  ses actions dédiées de pauvres femmes pour leur émancipation économique et financière.
texts.en:
The client, a counsellor in the "Goshen" credit group, is a very brave entrepreneur. She is a 32 year old widow, and mother of 5 young children who all attend school.
She is a seller of foodstuffs (beans, flour). Her husband died unexpectedly following a short illness. She offers her merchandise in the little local market, sometimes along the street leading to the big avenues.
She began her business with her own capital - funds raised from the sale of her equipment (TV, radio, telephone). Later, she benefited from additional funds in the form of a $50 loan from the micro-finance institution (MFI) Hekima. She has been undertaking these sorts of little income-generating activities for three years now. However, she has recently completed three loan cycles, taking advantage of the microcredit program from Hekima.
Insecurity in the interior of the region is a threat to the development of her business. This new loan will be used by her to buy 2 sacks of beans, and the rest of the funds will be put towards the children's education. She wishes to see the children grow up, and to build a decent home.
The borrower thanks Hekima for its focus on poor women, leading to their economic and financial emancipation.

loans.use: to purchase 2 sacks of beans.

loans.name: Pierre

texts.fr: Pierre est un homme de 55 ans  marié, père de 6 enfants dont l'age varie entre 7 et 26 ans, 4 vont encore à l'école. Il exerce une activité d'élévage depuis 2 ans déjà (il achète les poussins, les élève ensuite revend) elle  fonctionne à merveille mais son capital n'est pas élévé alors, il est obligé à chaque fois d'attendre que le stock acheté pour élever grandisse, qu'il le vende avant de racheter de nouveaux poussins d'où la rupture de stockquotienne qui cause l'insatisfaction de sa clientèle tout le temps. Il sollicite ce crédit pour acheter en grande quantité ce qui lui permettra non seulement de satisfaire sa clientèle déjà grandissante mais aussi de réaliser un plus gros profit.  Le benéfice que lui apportera ce crédit l'aidera à agrandir son activité( augmenter le nombre de poussins) et aussi à subvenir aux besoins quotidiens de sa famille.
texts.en:
Pierre is a 55 year old married man, a father of 6 children whose ages vary between 7 and 26 - 4 of them still go to school. He has run a chicken rearing business for the last two years (he buys chicks, rears them and then sells them on). This business works wonderfully, however he has only a small amount of working capital and so he is obliged to wait, each time he buys stock, for the chicks to grow so that he can sell them and buy new chicks. This causes him to be out of stock on a daily basis and makes his customers always dissatisfied.
He is seeking this loan in order to buy in bulk; this will allow him not only to meet the needs of his growing customer base, but also to make a bigger profit. The profit generated from the proceeds of this loan will allow him to grow his business (to increase the number of chicks) and also to meet the family's daily living costs.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of chicks.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tools for their motorcycle and pay for gasoline

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is 41 years old, married and has three children attending school. Her spouse is a farmer, while she raises hogs and re-sells them for profit. They work hard together in order to gain enough income for their children's education. 

She is now asking for a loan of PHP 9,000 to ensure the good growth of her hogs. She will buy the hog feed and medicines necessary to maintain good nutrition, which will lead to a higher price upon sale. 

In the future, Evelyn would like to become a successful hog raiser and earn good profits for education, as this is the only legacy she could pass on to her children.

loans.use: to buy hog feed and medicines for hog raising

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
Imelda is 45 years old and lives in the community of Manaring province in Isabela. 

Imelda is busy everyday selling different vegetables and fruits from the community. She sells her products from house to house in her neighborhood. 

During her hectic schedule, she makes sure that she also spends time with her family. She is a loving and hardworking mother and she ensures that she cooks for her children and her spouse Wilson. 

To have additional income, she is requesting a loan of PHP 15,000 to buy string beans, squash and tomatoes to expand her business and ensure that she can give the family its daily needs.

loans.use: to buy string beans, squash and tomatoes for her business

loans.name: Meralyn

texts.en:
Meralyn is 27 years old and is a married woman with four children aged one, three, six and seven. 

She runs a sari-sari store business in Talibon, Bohol. She earns 5,000 PHP per month selling items like shampoo, bath and detergent soap, snack foods and canned goods. 

Meralyn's income goes to her family's daily needs and she finds it hard to replenish her inventory rapidly. She requested a loan to buy more merchandise to sell, such as canned goods, soft drinks and snack foods. This loan will help increase Meralyn's sales and profitability.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise to sell, such as canned goods, soft drinks and snack foods

loans.name: Epifania

texts.en:
Epifania is 48 years old and married with five children.

Epifania works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 19,500 loan through NWTF to purchase more stocks to sell.

Epifania has borrowed and paid back seven loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for seven years and also earns an income from food vending.

Epifania aspires to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks to sell.

loans.name: Carolyn

texts.en:
Carolyn is married with three children. She is 46 years old and lives in Oroquieta City, Misamis Occidental.

To earn a living, her husband catches fish and she sells it at the market. She has had this business for 15 years. She has requested a loan of 14,900 PHP to purchase new fishing nets.

Carolyn has been a member of PMPC for four years. In the future, Carolyn hopes to own a fish carrier.

loans.use: to purchase new fishing nets

loans.name: Elsie

texts.en:
Elsie is 43 years old and married with three children.

Elsie works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items to sell in her general store, like shampoo and groceries.

Elsie has borrowed and paid back one loan from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for six years and also earns an income from the retail of gasoline.

Elsie aspires to save enough money, so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: To buy additional items to sell

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is 60 years old and married with seven children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Erlinda has a dried fish vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 29,500 loan through NWTF to buy more dried fish to sell.

Erlinda has been in this business for 13 years. In the future, Erlinda would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy more dried fish to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her rice farm

loans.name: Marcos Cosme

texts.es: Marcos Cosme de veintidós años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos; él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y tomate, tiene varios años de dedicarse a la agricultura y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia, su terreno está ubicado en una zona de alta incidencia agrícola y cerca de su residencia, el comercia en todas las zonas aledañas y ya tiene mucha clientela pues todo lo que vende es de primera calidad, a precios accesibles y con un buen servicio además para complementar con los gastos del hogar posee otro pequeño trabajo en la casa comunal del municipio; Marcos es un hombre emprendedor, responsable, honesto pero sobre todo humilde, le gusta aprovechar cada oportunidad que se le presenta, en esta ocasión quiere aumentar la siembra pero necesita de insumos y de capital para comprarlos ya que siempre lo realiza al contado, por  eso se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, tomate, fertilizante, herbicida, herramienta, etc. Marcos Cosme tiene buenas referencias de pago, tienen la seguridad de que lograra pagar la deuda con éxito y a la vez darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Marcos Cosme is twenty two years old. He lives with his life's compnain and their children. He grows corn and tomatoes. He has been a farmer for many years and has a lot of experience. His land is located in a very agricultural area and close to his house. He sells in all of the nearby towns and has a lot of customers because all of what he sells is of the best quality, at an accessible price, and with good service. He also has another small job at the communal house in town to help meet his household expenses. Marcos is an enterprising, responsible, honest and above all humble man. He likes to take advantage of every opportunity that presents itself. At this time he wants to increase his crop buts he needs materials and capital to buy them, because he always pays for them upfront. That is why he decided to ask INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow him to buy corn and tomato seeds, fertilizer, herbicides, tools, etc. Marcos Cosme has good payment references. He is sure that he will be able to pay the loan succesfully and give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn and tomato seeds and fertilizer, herbicides and tools.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stock of canned goods, soap, shampoo and beverages

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a motorcycle transport business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing 10,000 PHP through NWTF to buy spare parts for the maintenance of her motorcycle.

Erlinda has been in this business for 12 years. Erlinda earns more income from a general store, raising livestock and farming sugarcane.

Erlinda has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts, with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for the maintenance of her motorcycle

loans.name: Helen

texts.en:
Helen works hard to support her family. Helen is married and has a business buying and selling dried fish in the Philippines.

Helen requested a 17,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more dried fish to sell. Helen has been in this business for 3 years now.

In the future, Helen would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more dried fish to sell

loans.name: Norberto

texts.en:
Norberto is 44 years old and married to Norma, who is a mother who always takes care of her three children. Norberto is involved in planting and harvesting corn for sale. He has been in his business for 30 years. He usually received a net income of 30,000 PHP every harvest season.
