Right now, Norberto wants to borrow a loan amounting to 35,000 PHP to buy farm inputs such as fertilizer and corn seed and pay the labor cost for planting corn. He hopes that he can get the amount he requested for the further growth of his business.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs such as fertilizer and corn seed and pay the labor cost for planting corn

loans.name: Jesusa

texts.en:
As a married parent of one child, Jesusa works hard to support her family.

She has a motorcycle transport business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from buying and selling livestock. Jesusa is borrowing 15,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase spare parts for her motorcycle transport business.

Jesusa has been sustaining her business activities through her past 20 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for motorcycle maintenance

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is forty-three years old and married with three children.

Jocelyn works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell.

Jocelyn has borrowed and paid for seventeen loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for twelve years and also earns an income from buying and selling livestock.

Jocelyn aspires to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase more stock to sell.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn works hard to support her family. Jocelyn is married and has a fishing/fish vending business in the Philippines.

Jocelyn requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional materials for fishing.

Jocelyn has been in this business for seven years now.

In the future, Jocelyn would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: To buy additional materials for fishing.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy snacks, soap, shampoo and beverages to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy animal feed for pigs.

loans.name: Marlyn

texts.en:
Marlyn is fifty years old and married with three children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Marlyn runs a business doing direct selling of Avon products in the Philippines and requested a PHP 19,500 loan through NWTF to purchase more products to sell.

Marlyn has been in this business for fifteen years and sells a variety of items such as perfumes, lotions, creams, etc.. 

In the future Marlyn would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase more products to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy corn seeds, fertilizer, insecticide and pigs.

loans.name: Monina

texts.en:
Monina is forty-six years old and single with one child.

She earns a living by raising livestock in the Philippines. Monina is borrowing PHP 25,000 through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Monina has been raising livestock for five years and also earns additional income from buying and selling beauty products.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.en:
Rosa is thirty-seven years old and has three children. Rosa is married and two of her children are in school.

Rosa is in the agricultural business buying and selling livestock in the Philippines. Rosa requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional livestock to sell.

Rosa has been buying and selling livestock for two years now, and has borrowed three times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Rosa would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: To purchase additional livestock to sell.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan is forty-four years old and has six children. Susan is married and three of her children are in school.

Susan is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. Susan requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Susan has been raising pigs for twenty-two years now, and has borrowed eight times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Susan would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: To purchase additional feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Salome Gerardo

texts.es: Salome Gerardo vive junto a su grupo familiar conformado por su madre y su hermano, residen en casa propia, él se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene una amplia experiencia ya que tiene varios años de dedicarse a este trabajo, el terreno esta ubicado en una zona agrícola y muy cerca de su vivienda, el labora desde muy  temprano para aprovechar el día, siempre obtiene las mejores cosechas y comercia en todos los alrededores del lugar, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues las personas están seguras que todo lo que vende es de primera calidad, a precios accesibles y con un excelente servicio además también tiene de respaldo un pequeño trabajo de jornal que le ayuda a complementar los gastos del hogar, Salome es un hombre trabajador y visionario siempre en la búsqueda de nuevas oportunidades que le den paso a superarse y alcanzar el éxito, en la última cosecha tuvo un poco de perdida debido a la tormenta llamada E12 que afecto todo el país y necesita recuperarse y aumentar sus ganancias, para ello desea aumentar la producción e invertir en insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que permita comprar semilla de maíz y frijol, herramienta, fertilizante  insecticida, etc. Salome Gerardo ha tenido otros créditos y es de muy buena paga, tiene la seguridad que saldará la deuda en el periodo establecido y a la vez confía que le dará a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en: Salome Gerardo lives with his family that is made up of his mother and brother. They live in their own home and he makes a living farming, specifically farming corn and beans. He has ample experience as he's been making a living doing this work for several years. The land is located in an agricultural area very close to his home. He begins work very early to take advantage of the day, always obtains the best harvests, and does business in the surrounding areas. He has made many customers as people are sure that everything he sells is of the best quality, at affordable prices, and with excellent service. Moreover, he also has the support of a small day job that helps him supplement the household expenses. Salome is a hardworking man and a visionary who is always looking for new opportunities that allow him to better himself and reach success. In the last harvest he suffered a small loss due to the storm called E12 that affected the whole country. He needs to recover and increase his earnings. To do this he would like to increase his production and invest in supplies. For this reason he's requesting a loan from Integral that allows him to buy corn seed, bean seed, tools, fertilizer, insecticides, etc. Salome Gerardo has had other loans and has paid them. He has the assurance that he will pay off his debt in the established time and at the same time trusts that he will give his family a full life.

loans.use: to buy corn seed, bean seeds, tools, fertilizer, and insecticide.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business buying and selling bananas in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 16,000 through NWTF to purchase additional stock for her business buying and selling bananas.

Susan has been in this business for six years. Susan earns additional income from food vending.

Susan has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving money so as to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: To purchase additional stock to sell.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.en:
Antonio is fifty years old, married, and has had six children. He is a farmer in Iguig. He has been planting and harvesting rice to sell for over twelve years now and was happy to generate just enough income for the family's sustenance and especially for school fees. He would like to maintain healthier crops so as to get additional income so he is now asking for a loan of PHP 30,000 to buy fertilizers, rice seeds, and pesticides to use in farming. This will help ensure an abundant harvest and allow him to earn more income.

Antonio hopes that one day, if he continues to achieve abundant harvests, he will be able to make enough profit to save funds to ensure the overall welfare of his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, rice seeds, and pesticides to use in farming.

loans.name: Pc Malicounda Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe de femmes faisant partie d'un banc villageois a été crée depuis 2008. Il est composé de 19 femmes qui habitent le même village.

Elles sont unies par des relations sociales communes.Leur activité principale se trouve être le commerce.

Madame Birane (assise à gauche sur la photo et levant la main) est une femme mariée âgée de 75 ans  et mère de trois enfants majeurs.

Elle fait du commerce depuis longtemps elle dispose d'une bonne expérience dans ce domaine .

Son nouveau crédit de 125000 f lui permettra de se procurer de la marchandise pré citée.

Les bénéfices  de son activité lui permettent de payer la scolarité de ses petits fils ,de payer la nourriture 

de cotiser à la mutuelle.
texts.en:
This group of women are members of a "banc villageois" which was formed in 2008. The group comprises 19 women who live in the same village. They are united by common social bonds and their main business is retail.

Birane (sitting on the left of the picture, with her hand raised) is a 75-year-old married woman and the mother of 3 adult children. She has been a retailer for a long time and is very experienced in this area. Her new loan of 125 000 francs will enable her to restock on merchandise. The profits generated by her business allow her to pay for her grandsons' education, to buy food and to pay contributions to the mutual fund.

loans.use: to buy peanut butter and fish.

loans.name: Bertila

texts.es: Bertila de cuarenta y cinco años de edad vive junto a sus hijos en casa propia, ella se dedica a la agricultura específicamente a granos básicos, maíz, frijol entre otros, tiene mucha experiencia y siempre obtiene las mejores cosechas, el terreno está ubicado en una zona agrícola, comercia en todos los alrededores y es muy conocida por las personas, se ha hecho de mucha clientela ya que todo lo que vende es de calidad, a precios accesibles y con un buen servicio, además para complementar gastos recibe ayuda de algunos de sus hijos; Bertila es una mujer trabajadora,  siempre a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que le ayuden a ganarse un futuro más próspero, quiere aumentar la producción en esta temporada de siembra pero necesita de ingresos, por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, fertilizantes, herramienta, etc. Bertila no tiene experiencia crediticia pero si muy buenas referencias de pago, tiene la certeza que podrá pagar la deuda, y a la vez darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Bertila is 45 years old and lives in her own house with her children. She works in agriculture, specifically basic grains, corn, beans and others. She has lots of experience and always obtains the best harvests. Her land is located in an agricultural area, and she sells in the surrounding areas. She is well known by everyone, and has won many customers as she sells quality products which are affordable, as well as offering a good service. To help with her expenses she also receives help from some of her children. 

Bertila is a hard-working woman, who is always on the lookout for new opportunities to help her have a more prosperous future. She wants to increase her crop production this season, and has therefore requested a loan from INTEGRAL to buy corn seeds, beans, fertilizers, tools, etc. Bertila does not have any loan experience but does have good payment references. She is sure that she will be able to repay her debt, and will be able to give her family a good life.

loans.use: To buy corn seeds, beans, fertilizers and tools.

loans.name: Manuela Paula

texts.es: Manuela Paula vive junto a sus hijos y nietos, ella posee una pupusería desde ya hace varios años, elabora pupusas en variedad: revueltas, queso, frijol con queso, entre otros  es muy conocida en la zona pues son las más ricas del lugar , se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues la gente la prefiere porque todo es elaborado con material de primera calidad y las vende a precio accesible además el servicio es inigualable. Manuela se caracteriza por su gran amabilidad; es una mujer visionaria, ejemplar y de familia, siempre está a la expectativa de alternativas que le ayuden a encontrar un futuro mejor lleno de éxitos y alegrías, una de sus grandes metas es ver crecer su negocio e invertir en compras al contado, por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor, queso, frijoles, chicharrón, verduras, etc. Manuela Paula tiene capacidad crediticia y está segura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Manuela Paula lives with her children and grandchildren. She has had a business making pupusas (thick corn tortillas stuffed with various fillings) for various years, where she makes a variety of pupusas: mixed, cheese, beans and cheese, and others. She is well-known because her pupusas are the tastiest in the area. 

She has gained many customers who prefer her food, as it is all made with top-quality material and she sells it at an affordable price. Furthermore, her service is unrivaled. Manuela is known for her friendliness, and she is a visionary, exemplary and family-focused woman. She is always on the lookout for opportunities to help her have a better future full of success and happiness. 

One of Manuela’s goals is to see her business grow and invest in cash purchases. This is why she has asked for a loan from INTEGRAL to buy wholesale corn, cheese, beans, pork crackling, vegetables, etc. She has the capacity to take out this loan and is sure that she will be able to repay it, all the while giving her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy wholesale corn, cheese, beans, pork crackling and vegetables.

loans.name: Jose Clemente

texts.es: José Clemente vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos en casa propia; Él se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de maíz, tiene varios años de dedicarse a este rubro y se ha hecho de experiencia muy valiosa que le permite siempre obtener las mejores cosechas, el ama su trabajo se levanta desde muy temprano para aprovechar el día sus hijos le colaboran para avanzar aún más en el trabajo, el terreno está ubicado en una zona agrícola cerca de su residencia, comercia en todos los lugares aledaños y ya tiene mucha clientela pues saben que todo lo que vende es de calidad y a un buen precio además el servicio es excelente; José es un hombre luchador dispuesto a cumplir sus objetivos, trabajando duro para lograr sus objetivos, en esta época de siembra quiere aumentar la producción y necesita invertir en insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, fertilizante, herbicidas, herramienta, etc. José Clemente ha tenido otros créditos y es de muy buena paga, se hace totalmente responsable de cancelar este financiamiento dado que además de la agricultura se dedica a comercializar leña, espera con ésta decisión ofrecer a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
José Clemente lives with his life partner and children in his own house. He works in agriculture, specifically corn growing. He has worked in this field for many years, and has valuable experience which allows him to obtain the best harvests. 

He loves his job and gets up very early in the morning to make the most of the day. His children help him to get ahead even more with his work. His land is located in an agricultural area close to his home, and he sells in all the surrounding areas. He has lots of customers because they know that he sells quality produce at a good price, and he offers an excellent service. 

José is a determined man who is prepared to meet his goals, working hard to do so. During this planting season he wants to increase his production, and needs to invest in supplies. This is why he has requested a loan from INTEGRAL to buy corn seeds, fertilizer, herbicide, tools, etc. José Clemente has had other loans and is a good payer. He assumes full responsibility for repaying this loan as, in addition to agriculture, he also sells firewood. He hopes that this decision will help him offer his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy corn seeds, fertilizer, herbicides and tools.

loans.name: Frix Osmin

texts.es: Frix Osmin vive junto a su familia en casa propia, él se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de granos básicos, maíz y frijol, tiene varios años de trabajar en el rubro y tiene una amplia experiencia que le permite obtener muy buenas cosechas, su negocio le ha dado resultado y le deja muy buenas ganancias, el terreno donde siembra esta ubicado en una zona de amplia incidencia agrícola muy cercano a su localidad, el comercia en todos los alrededores y es muy conocido por las personas, se ha hecho de mucha clientela fija, pues saben que todo lo que comercia es de primera calidad, a precios accesibles y por supuesto con un servicio excelente, además para aportar aún más a los gastos del hogar tiene un trabajo de jornal; Frix es un hombre joven y ejemplar tiene muchas metas que desea alcanzar y siempre esta a la expectativa de las oportunidades que le abrirán camino al éxito, en este periodo de siembra quiere aumentar la producción y obtener las mejores ganancias pero necesita de capital para invertir en insumos comprados al contado, por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, fertilizante, insecticida, etc. Frix Osmin tiene experiencia crediticia y muy buenas recomendaciones, él se responsabiliza a pagar en el tiempo establecido el financiamiento y a la vez confía en que le dará a su familia un futuro más próspero.
texts.en: Frix Osmin lives with his family in their home. He makes a living farming, specifically farming basic grains like corn and beans. He has been working in this area for several years and has ample experience that allows him to obtain very good harvests. His business has shown results and provides very good earnings. The land that he farms is located in an area of ample farming very close to his locality. He does business in all the surrounding areas and is very well known by people. He has made a lot of regular customers as they know that everything he sells is of the best quality, at affordable prices, and of course offered with excellent service. Moreover, to contribute even more to the household expenses he has a day job. Frix is a young, exemplary man who has many goals that he wishes to reach, and he's always waiting for opportunities that will open to a path of success. During this sowing period he wants to increase production and obtain better earnings, but he needs the capital to invest in purchased supplies in cash. For this reason he's requesting a loan from Integral that allows him to buy corn seeds, bean seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, etc. Frix Osmin has a credit background and very good recommendations. He takes the responsibility of paying back the financing in the established time and at the same time trusts that he will give his family a more prosperous future.

loans.use: to buy corn seeds, bean seeds, fertilizer, and insecticide.

loans.name: Luis Ricardo

texts.es: Luis Ricardo vive junto a sus hijas, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz, tiene varios años de dedicarse a la agricultura y se ha hecho de experiencia muy valiosa, el terreno donde siembra está ubicado en una zona cercana a su vivienda y en un lugar de incidencia agrícola, le gusta cultivar siempre lo hace con los mejores ánimos por eso obtiene las mejores cosechas, comercia en todos los alrededores y ya tiene mucha clientela fija porque saben todo lo que vende es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además tiene un pequeño respaldo de una venta de leña; Luis es un hombre ejemplar, muy dedicado a su hogar y a su labor, quiere cumplir muchas metas para alcanzar el éxito y  no defraudar a su familia, en este periodo de siembra quiere aumentar la producción pero necesita de capital para la compra de insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, fertilizante, insecticida, herbicida, etc. Luis Ricardo ha tenido créditos anteriormente y los ha cancelado a tiempo, tiene buenas referencias, sabe que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez ofreceré a su familia un futuro próspero.
texts.en:
Luis Ricardo lives with his daughters. He grows corn, has worked in agriculture for many years and has valuable experience. The land where he grows his crops is located in an area close to his home, in an agricultural zone. He likes to grow crops and always does so with enthusiasm, helping him to have the best harvests. 

Luis Ricardo sells his produce in the surrounding area, and has many regular customers as they all know that his produce is top quality and affordable. He also receives a small income from the sale of firewood. 

Luis is an exemplary man, who is very dedicated to his home and his work. He wants to meet many goals so that he can be successful and not let his family down. During this planting period he wants to increase his production, but needs capital to buy supplies. This is why he has requested a loan from INTEGRAL to buy corn seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, herbicide, etc. 

Luis Ricardo has had loans in the past which he has repaid on time. He has good references, and knows that he will be able to repay his debt and provide his family with a prosperous future.

loans.use: To buy corn seeds, fertilizer, insecticide and herbicide.

loans.name: Anonymous Group

texts.fr: La cliente, conseillère  de l’association de crédit  « Mungu iko », est un entrepreneur très courageuse, âgée de 35 ans, mère de 5 jeunes enfants qui étudient tous.  Son mari est sans emploi. Elle est vendeuse des boissons (Primus, Fanta). Elle installe ses marchandises dans un petit Kiosque, situé au long de la rue donnant axer aux avenues. Elle commença son business avec son fonds propre reçu de son conjoint. Plus tard, elle bénéficia un fond additionnel de crédit de 50$ de l’IMF Hekima. Il y a 4 ans révolus qu’elle exerce ces petites activités génératrices de revenus. Cependant, elle vient de réaliser  17  cycles en profitant  du programme de microcrédit de l’IMF Hekima. L’insécurité dans l’intérieur de la province constitue une menace pour le développement de ses activités.  Ce nouveau crédit doit lui servir  de s’approvisionner avec  la boisson (20 casiers de Primus, 15 casiers de Fanta) et le reste d’argent sera affecté dans l’investissement.  En plus, elle souhaite  voir ses enfants grandir et créer un bistro.  La cliente remercie Hekima pour  ses actions dédiées de pauvres femmes pour leur émancipation économique et financière.
texts.en:
The client, councillor of the credit association « Mungu iko » and a brave entrepreneur, is 35 years old and the mother of 5 young children who are all studying. Her husband is unemployed.

She sells drinks (Primus, Fanta). She displays her merchandise in a small stall located near an access road leading to the main thoroughfares. She started her business with funds received from her spouse. Later on, she received additional funding of $50 from the IMF Hekima. She has been engaged in these revenue-generating activities for 4 years.

She has benefited from 17 loan cycles with the IMF Hekima microfinancing program. The insecurity in the interior of the province is a threat to the development of her business activities. This new loan will allow her to restock on drinks (20 cases of Primus, 15 cases of Fanta) and to invest in her business. She would also like to watch her children grow up, and open a bistro.

The customer thanks Hekima for its actions in aid of the economic and financial emancipation of women of insufficient means.

loans.use: to buy drinks (20 cases of Primus, 15 cases of Fanta).

loans.name: Pc 2 Tefess Femme Marayeuse Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe extrait du Banc Villageois a était créé le 02/09/2008,il regroupe 26 femmes du même quartier et des quartiers environnants.
Elles sont unies par des relations sociales communes. leur activité principale est le petit commerce .
Madame Sanou (debout à droite de la photo) est une femme marié age de 52 ans et mère de 5 enfants dont 2 garçons et 3 filles.
Elle s'active dans le commerce de poisson depuis plus de 20ans,son nouveau crédit de 50000f lui permettra d’acheter des paniers de poisson qu'elle va revendre au détail sur la plage.
Avec ses bénéfices elle envisage de construire une maison et de prendre en charge les besoins alimentaires de sa famille .
texts.en:
This association groups together 26 women who live in the same district and surrounding neighbourhoods, and who are members of a "banc villageois" created on the 2nd of September 2008. The women are united by common social bonds and are principally small retailers.

Sanou (standing on the right of the picture) is a 52-year-old married woman and mother of 5 children, 2 boys and 3 girls. She has been selling fish for over 20 years. Her new loan of 50 000 francs will enable her to buy baskets of fish which she will resell, retail, at the beach. She intends to use her profits to build a house and to take care of her family's food needs.

loans.use: to buy fresh fish.

loans.name: Thelma

texts.en:
Thelma is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a motorcycle transport business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 25,000 through NWTF to buy spare parts for the maintenance of her motorcycle transport business.

Thelma has been in this business for six years. Thelma earns additional income from a general store.

Thelma has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: To buy spare parts for the maintenance of her motorcycle.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is twenty-eight years old and married with one child.

Jocelyn works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items to sell.

Jocelyn has borrowed and paid for seven loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for four years and also earns an income from farming sugarcane. 

Jocelyn aspires to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: To buy additional items to sell.

loans.name: Ismaela

texts.en:
Ismaela is married with five children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Ismaela is thirty-one years old and three of her children are in school.

Ismaela has a fishing business in the Philippines. Ismaela requested a PHP 14,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase a fishing net and other equipment.

Ismaela has been in this business for four years. In the future, Ismaela would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase a fishing net and other equipment.

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
Imelda works hard to support her family. Imelda is married and has a business selling used clothing in the Philippines.

Imelda requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional bundles of used clothes to sell.

Imelda has been in this business for twenty-one years now.

In the future, Imelda would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase additional bundles of used clothes to sell.

loans.name: Pilar

texts.en:
Pilar is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fish-vending business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to buy more fish to sell on her food stall.

NWTF is relisting Pilar's business profile again in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell on her food stall.

loans.name: Precilla

texts.en: This time, Precilla is borrowing PHP 20,000 to fund her general store business. This business was previously funded through Kiva partner NWTF and it continues to provide Precilla and her family with an income that is improving their quality of life.

loans.use: to buy items like shampoo and groceries to sell in her sari-sari store.

loans.name: Trinidad

texts.en:
Trinidad is forty-seven years old and has eight children. Trinidad is married and six of her children are in school.

Trinidad is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. Trinidad requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Trinidad has been raising pigs for eight years now, and has borrowed five times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Trinidad would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy animal feed for her pigs.

loans.name: Ps Sindia Lorong Group

texts.fr:
Ce banc villageois a été crée depuis le 02/09/ 2008 .

Il est composé de femmes qui habitent le même quartier et se partageant des valeurs sociales communes.Elles 

pratiques toutes le commerce

Madame Rokhaya est une femme mariée âgée de70 ans et mère de 8 enfants .

Son nouveau crédit de 390000 f lui permettra de se procurer de la marchandise pré citée.

Les bénéfices générés par son activité lui permettent de renforcer ses épargnes et de subvenir aux besoins 

familiaux.
texts.en:
This "banc villageois" was established on the 2nd of September, 2008. It is made up of women who live in the same district and share common social values. They are all retailers.

Rokhaya is a 70-year-old married woman and the mother of 8 children. Her new loan of 390 000 francs will enable her to buy fruits and herb tea. The profits generated by her business will allow her to build up her savings and meet her family's needs.

loans.use: to buy fruits and herb tea.

loans.name: Kimya Group

texts.fr: La cliente Kyakimwa, conseillère  de l’association de crédit  « Kimya », est un entrepreneur très courageuse, âgée de 39 ans, mère de 4 jeunes enfants qui étudient tous.  Son mari est infirmier soignant dans un hôpital de la place. Elle est vendeuse des poissons. Elle installe ses marchandises dans le marché central de Virunga. Elle commença son business avec son fonds propre reçu de son conjoint. Plus tard, elle bénéficia un fond additionnel de crédit de base de l’IMF Hekima. Il y a 17 ans révolus qu’elle exerce ces petites activités génératrices de revenus. Cependant, elle vient de réaliser  5  cycles en profitant  du programme de microcrédit de l’IMF Hekima. L’insécurité dans l’intérieur de la province constitue une menace pour le développement de ses activités.  Ce nouveau crédit doit lui servir  de s’approvisionner avec  les poissons (24 colis) et le reste d’argent sera affecté dans l’investissement.  En plus, elle souhaite  voir ses enfants grandir, finir leurs études et construire une maison.  La cliente remercie Hekima pour  ses actions dédiées de pauvres femmes pour leur émancipation économique et financière.
texts.en:
Kyakimwa, councillor of the credit association « Kimya » and a brave entrepreneur, is 39 years old and the mother of 4 young children who all go to school. Her husband works as a registered nurse in a local hospital.

Kyakimwa sells fish. She displays her merchandise at the central Virunga market. She started her business with funds received from her spouse. Later on, she received additional funding in the form of basic credit from IMF Hekima. She has been engaged in these revenue-generating activities for 17 years.

Kyakimwa has benefited from 5 loan cycles with the IMF Hekima microfinancing program. The insecurity in the interior of the province is a threat to the development of her business activities. This new loan will allow her to restock on fish (24 packages), and she will invest the rest in her business. She would also like to watch her children grow up and complete their studies, and build a house.

The customer thanks Hekima for its actions in aid of the economic and financial emancipation of women of insufficient means.

loans.use: to buy fish (24 packages).

loans.name: Terimbere Iii Group

texts.fr:
Jacqueline fait partie du groupe Terimbere III  et habite à  Cibitoke. Elle a  32 ans et est mariée à Eric, cultivateur. Ensemble ils ont 4enfants, âgés de  2mois à 12 ans

Elle fait le commerce de sorgho  depuis 10 ans. 

C'est son premier  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et acheter une grande quantité de sorgho  à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, elle voudrait acheter une moto, construire une maison dans sa parcelle.
texts.en:
Jacqueline is a member of the Terimbere III group and lives in Cibitoke. She is 32 years old and is married to Eric, a farmer. The couple have 4 children together, aged between 2 months and 12 years.

Jacqueline has been selling sorghum for 10 years. This is her first loan from Turame. The Kiva-sponsored loan will increase her capital and she will buy a large quantity of sorghum to resell so that she can earn more money. In the years ahead, she would like to buy a motorbike and build a house on her plot of land.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of sorghum.

loans.name: Anna Lee

texts.en:
Anna Lee is 32 years old and married, with one child in school. She works very hard to provide for the family.

Anna Lee runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell.

She has been in this business for eight years and sells a variety of items, such as sardines, noodles, sugar, detergent and other groceries. 

In the future, Anna Lee would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell in her store.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.en:
Gladys is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a food vending business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 25,000 through NWTF to purchase additional ingredients for her business.

Gladys has been in this business for 15 years. She earns more income from frozen foods and pig fattening.

Gladys has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts, along with the help of loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: To purchase additional ingredients for her business.

loans.name: Nenita

texts.en:
As a married parent of seven children, Nenita works hard to support her family.

She buys and sells rice in the Philippines and earns additional income from raising pigs and buying and selling charcoal. Nenita is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to buy additional sacks of rice to sell.

Nenita has been sustaining her business activities through her past six loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: To buy additional sacks of rice to sell.

loans.name: Arlene

texts.en:
Arlene works hard to support her family. She is married and has a fruit vending business in the Philippines.

Arlene requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy more fruit to sell in her food stall.

She has been in this business for five years now and also earns additional income from hog raising.

In the future, Arlene would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more fruit to sell in her food stall.

loans.name: Kimya Renove Group

texts.fr: La cliente, leader de l’association de crédit, est un entrepreneur très ambitieuse, expérimentée, âgée de 37 ans, mère de 6 jeunes enfants qui étudient tous.  Son mari est un  fonctionnaire dans l’administration publique. La cliente est vendeuse des poissons. Elle installe ses marchandises dans le marché central de Virunga. Elle commença son business avec son fonds propre reçu de son conjoint. Plus tard, elle bénéficia un fond additionnel de crédit de base de l’IMF Hekima. Il y a 8 ans révolus qu’elle exerce ces petites activités génératrices de revenus. Cependant, elle vient de réaliser  5  cycles en profitant  du programme de microcrédit de l’IMF Hekima. L’insécurité dans l’intérieur de la province, en cours de route et l’instabilité macro économique suite à la variation de prix sur le marché constituent une menace sérieuse pour le développement de son business.  Ce nouveau crédit doit lui servir  de s’approvisionner avec  les poissons (12 colis) et le reste d’argent sera affecté dans l’investissement. Les bénéfices de son activité lui servent de scolarité, d’habillement, de nourriture, etc. pour ses enfants.  En plus, elle souhaite  voir ses enfants grandir, finir leurs études et construire une maison.  La cliente remercie Hekima pour  ses actions dédiées de pauvres femmes pour leur émancipation économique et financière.
texts.en:
The leader of the credit association is an ambitious and experienced entrepreneur. She is 37 years old and the mother of 6 young children who all study. Her husband is a civil servant who is employed in the public administration sector.

She sells fish. She displays her merchandise at the central market of Virunga. She started her business with funds received from her spouse. Later on, she benefited from additional funding in the form of basic credit from IMF Hekima. She has been engaged in these revenue-generating activities for 8 years. She has benefited from 5 loan cycles with the IMF Hekima microfinancing program. 

The developing insecurity in the interior of the province and the unstable macro-economic situation due to fluctuating market prices constitute serious threats to the development of her business activities. This new loan will allow her to buy fish (12 packages), and she will invest the rest. The profits from her business allow her to pay her children's educational, clothing and food expenses. She would also like to watch her children grow up and complete their studies, and build a house.

The customer thanks Hekima for its actions in aid of the economic and financial emancipation of women of insufficient means.

loans.use: to buy fish (12 packages).

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is a farmer in Kitale, Western Kenya, and has been farming for five years, producing and selling milk and eggs to the local market. She is married, with one child, aged 12 years.

Josephine has requested a loan of 30,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy more poultry to expand her business. She says her years of experience in farming, and more particularly poultry, is enough to help her earn the best return from her investment. She is optimistic that her family's living standards will be better.

Josephine appreciates Juhudi Kilimo’s loan services.

loans.use: To buy more poultry to expand her poultry farming business.

loans.name: Julio Leonidas

texts.es: Julio Leónidas de veinticinco años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos;  él se dedica al cultivo de maíz tiene ocho años de dedicarse  a la agricultura y está muy orgulloso de la valiosa experiencia que ha  ganado, su terreno está ubicado en una zona agrícola cerca de su residencia, el comercia en todos los alrededores y tiene mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo lo que vende es de primera calidad, a precios accesibles y con  atención excelente, también trabaja de vigilante de la sub estación eso le ayuda para completar los gastos del hogar;  Julio es un hombre emprendedor, con muchas ganas de salir adelante, su mayor objetivo es alcanzar el triunfo y ganarse un futuro más próspero, quiere aumentar la producción porque solo así aumentará sus ganancias pero para invertir necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, fertilizantes, herbicidas, herramientas, etc. Julio es responsable y muy honesto posee buenas referencias de pago y ofrece la certeza de cancelar a tiempo el financiamiento y a la vez quiere darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Julio Leónidas is 25 years of age. He lives with his life partner and children, and works growing corn. He has worked in agriculture for eight years, and is very proud of the valuable experience he has obtained. His land is located in an agricultural area close to his home, and he sells in all the surrounding areas. Julio has many customers as they know that the produce he sells is top quality and affordable, and his customer service is excellent.

Julio also works as a security guard in the sub-station, which helps supplement the household expenses. He is an enterprising man with a strong desire to get ahead. His biggest goal is to be successful and ensure a more prosperous future. He wants to increase his production as this is the only way to increase his income, but to invest he needs capital. He has therefore requested a loan from INTEGRAL to buy corn seeds, fertilizers, herbicides, tools, etc. 

Julio is responsible and very honest. He has good payment references and is sure that he will be able to repay the loan on time, while giving his family a good quality of life.

loans.use: To buy corn seed, fertilizers, herbicides and tools.

loans.name: Kinya Group

texts.fr: La cliente est vendeuse des poissons. Elle installe ses marchandises dans le marché central de Virunga. Elle commença son business avec son fonds propre reçu de son conjoint. Plus tard, elle bénéficia un fond additionnel de crédit de base de l’IMF Hekima. Il y a 11 ans révolus qu’elle exerce ces petites activités génératrices de revenus. Cependant, elle vient de réaliser  5  cycles en profitant  du programme de microcrédit de l’IMF Hekima. L’insécurité dans l’intérieur de la province et l’instabilité macro économique suite à la variation de prix sur le marché constituent une menace sérieuse pour le développement de ses activités.Ce nouveau crédit doit lui servir  de s’approvisionner avec  les poissons (24 colis) et le reste d’argent sera affecté dans l’investissement.  En plus, elle souhaite  voir ses enfants grandir, finir leurs études et construire une maison.  La cliente remercie Hekima pour  ses actions dédiées de pauvres femmes pour leur émancipation économique et financière.  Il sied de signaler qu’une cliente tient son bébé à main.
texts.en:
The customer sells fish. She displays her merchandise at the central market of Virunga. She started her business with funds received from her spouse. Later on, she benefited from additional funding in the form of basic credit from IMF Hekima. She has been engaged in these revenue-generating activities for 11 years. She has benefited from 5 loan cycles with the IMF Hekima microfinancing program. The insecurity in the interior of the province and the unstable macro-economic situation due to changing market prices both constitute serious threats to the development of her business activities. This new loan will allow her to restock on fish (24 packages), and she will invest the rest. She would also like to watch her children grow up and complete their studies, and build a house.

The customer thanks Hekima for its actions in aid of the economic and financial emancipation of women of insufficient means.

Note: one customer in the picture is holding her baby.

loans.use: to buy fish (24 packages).

loans.name: Estela Antonia

texts.es: Estela Antonia de 26 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su  esposo e hijos. Ella  se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos en especial, maíz.  De esta forma brinda lo necesario a su familia.  Después de sacar la cosecha, pone  a la venta cierta parte de los granos básicos para poder suplir el resto de necesidades. Vale la pena mencionar que esta es su principal fuente de ingresos. Muchas personas dan buenas referencias tanto de su trabajo como de su persona ya que es una mujer  trabajadora, responsable y honesta.  Cada día siente que las necesidades de su hogar son mayores por lo que ha decidido solicitar este préstamo a INTEGRAL  de tal manera que por medio de la ayuda de esta institución pueda comprar los insumos necesarios (abonos, semillas, venenos para plagas, etc.) los cuales son necesarios para  dar inicio al cultivo del maíz lo antes posible.  Espera y confía en Dios todo poderoso que obtendrá resultados positivos y logrará su sueño de brindar a su querida familia mejores condiciones de vida y económicas.
texts.en:
Estela Antonia is 26 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and children. She grows basic grains, especially corn. This how she provides for her family. After harvesting the grains, she sells a certain amount of them and uses the money to meet the rest of her family's needs. It's worth mentioning that this is her family's main source of income. Estela has received many good references, for her work as well as her character. She is a hard-working, responsible, honest woman. 

Every day her family's needs are greater, which is why she has decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL. This way she will be able to buy supplies like fertilizer, seeds, pesticides, etc, which are necessary in order to start growing corn. She hopes and trusts in God that she will have positive results and will achieve her dream of giving her beloved family a better life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, seeds and pesticides.

loans.name: Rhina Claribel

texts.es: Rhina Claribel tiene 38 años de edad y habita junto a su grupo familiar el cual está compuesto por su hija de 12 años y su hijo  de 9 años, los dos  se encuentran estudiando. Es madre soltera, pero su esposo ayuda con la manutención de sus hijos cuando tiene las posibilidades. La necesidad de sacar adelante a sus hijos, la hicieron trabajar duro para lograr percibir lo necesario para las demandas de sus hijos. Con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado establecer un negocio en el cual vende productos de consumo. En su negocio las personas pueden encontrar variedad de antojitos como: atol, poleada,  plátanos en miel, empanadas, nuégados, etc. La ubicación del negocio es muy estratégica, ya que se encuentra en una de las calles principales de la zona donde habita. Además también realiza la venta en su hogar de habitación. Es una mujer emprendedora la cual muchas personas conocen por ser muy luchadora, generosa, responsable y dedicada en sus tareas.  Ella es el principal soporte económico de su familia, y este negocio es lo único que posee para ganarse la vida honradamente y continuar llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar. Como todo una mujer visionaria con ganas de superarse, solicita este crédito para invertir en su negocio en la compra de los insumos necesarios (azúcar, sal, frutas, canela, leche, sal, etc.) para continuar elaborando los ricos antojitos que tanto degustan sus clientes. Prevé que con esta inversión logrará impulsar las ventas las cuales le generarán un incremento en los ingresos y así podrá tener acceso a mejores oportunidades de vida para ella y  sus hijos.
texts.en:
Rhina Claribel is 38 years of age and lives with her family: a daughter aged 12 and a son aged nine, both of whom are at school. She is a single mother but the children’s father helps with their upkeep whenever he can. 

As she needed to help her children get ahead, she has worked hard to make sure that they have everything they need. With great effort she has set up a business selling food. Her customers can find a variety of snacks in her business, such as atol (a thick, corn-based drink), poleada (a sweet milk drink), bananas in honey, empanadas, fritters, etc. Her business is strategically located on one of the main streets in the area in which she lives. She also sells her produce in a room in her home. 

Rhina Claribel is a very enterprising woman who is known by others to be very determined, generous, responsible and dedicated to her tasks. She is the main breadwinner in her home, and this business is the only one she has to allow her to earn an honest living and continue providing for her household every day. As a visionary woman with a desire to get ahead, she has requested this loan to invest in her business by buying the supplies she needs (sugar, salt, fruit, cinnamon, milk, salt, etc.) to continuing making the delicious snacks her customers enjoy. 

With the loan she hopes to encourage sales, which will increase her income and allow her and her children to have access to better opportunities in their lives.

loans.use: To buy sugar, salt, fruit, cinnamon, milk, salt, etc.

loans.name: Tito De Jesús

texts.es: Tito de Jesús tiene 69 años de edad, hace algunos años falleció su esposa y sus hijos son mayores de edad y ya hicieron sus hogares. Esta es la razón por la cual habita solo en casa de su propiedad. Trabajó muy duro para sacar adelante a su familia dado que él siempre fue el principal soporte económico de la familia. Ahora que vive solo continúa trabajando ya que él es un hombre emprendedor, carismático y dedicado a sus labores. Desde hace 9 años estableció una pequeña tienda en su hogar de habitación en la cual comercializa variedad de productos de primera necesidad. Su negocio es lo que le permite ganarse la vida y mantenerse ocupado ya que por su avanzada edad no puede buscar un trabajo fuera de su hogar. Con muchas ganas de superarse y continuar ganándose el pan de cada día ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su tienda en la compra de mercadería (arroz, frijoles, aceite, café, leche, macarrones, detergentes, etc.) para su tienda la cual es muy importante mantenerla activa ya que esto le da estabilidad emocional y le permite llevar el sustento a su hogar.
texts.en:
Tito de Jesús is 69 years of age. A few years ago his wife passed away, and his children are grown up and have their own homes. This is why he lives alone in the house he owns. He worked hard to ensure his family got ahead, as he was always the main breadwinner. Now that he is alone he continues to work as he is enterprising, charismatic and dedicated to his job. 

Nine years ago he set up a small store in a room in his house, where he sells a wide range of basic necessities. His business is what allows him to earn a living and keep busy, as he is elderly and cannot look for a job outside of his home. He wants to move forward and continue earning a living, and has therefore decided to request this loan from INTEGRAL to invest in his store by buying goods (rice, beans, oil, coffee, milk, pasta, detergents, etc.) for the store. It is important that his store remains in operation, as this gives him emotional stability and allows him to provide for his household.

loans.use: To buy rice, beans, oil, coffee, milk, pasta, detergents, etc.

loans.name: Alma Yaneth

texts.es: Alma Yaneth, no logro terminar sus estudios, ya que su familia no contaba con los recursos necesarios para pagarle los estudios escolares.  La necesidad la impulso a aprender el oficio de fabricación y venta de variedad de piñatas. Tiene 31 años de edad y habita junto a sus hijos. Ella es una mujer luchadora la cual se caracteriza por ser emprendedora, carismática, responsable y muy generosa. Tiene muy buenas referencias por parte de sus vecinos y clientes los cuales expresan estar muy satisfechos con el servicio que reciben.  Para ella lo más importante es que sus hijos cuenten con mejores condiciones a las que ella ha tenido.  Trabaja muy duro para poder llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar y poder satisfacer las necesidades de sus hijos. Solicita esté préstamo a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio en la compra de la materia prima necesaria (periódico, alambre, pega, variedad de papel de colores,  etc.) para la elaboración de las piñatas. Su intención es incrementar las ventas y sus ingresos por medio de esta decisión, con la cual espera tener resultados favorables, que le permita mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Alma Yaneth was unable to finish her studies because her family did not have the resources necessary to pay for them. Out of necessity Alma learned how to make and sell a variety of piñatas. She is 31 years old and lives with her children. She is a strong woman, which she demonstrates by being entrepreneurial, charismatic, responsible and very generous. She gets great references from her neighbors and her customers who are very happy with the service they receive. 

For Alma, the most important thing is that her children grow up in better conditions than she did. She works very hard to put food on the table and to meet the needs of her children. She is requesting this loan from INTEGRAL in order to invest in her business and buy the raw material she needs (newspaper, wire, glue, colored paper,etc) to make her piñatas. She plans to increase her sales and her income. Alma hopes to get good results that allow her to improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy newspaper, wire, glue and colored paper.

loans.name: Nancy Marlene

texts.es: Nancy Marlene tiene 32 años  y habita junto a sus cuatro hijos. Ella se dedica al comercio de tienda desde hace muchos años. Su negocio está ubicado en el mercado de la zona donde habita, lugar que es muy transitado y concurrido.  Ella trabaja muy duro para sacar  adelante a sus hijos, debido a que su esposo no vive con ellos y lo poco con lo que ayuda no alcanza a cubrir las necesidades básicas de su hogar.  En su negocio se encuentra variedad de productos de primera necesidad como: cereales, productos alimenticios, productos de limpieza etc. Es muy conocida en la zona como una mujer luchadora, dedicada y responsable. Hace todo lo que esté en sus manos para llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar.  Solicita esté crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio en la compra de productos de tienda (cereales, aceite, café, macarrones, azúcar, sal, productos de limpieza, etc.) para impulsar las ventas y percibir un aumento en sus ingresos y así poder continuar llevando el sustento a su hogar y continuar luchando por una mejor calidad de vida para ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Nancy Marlene is 32 years of age and lives with her four children. She has worked selling goods in a store for many years. Her business is located in the market in the area where she lives, which is frequented by many people. 

Nancy Marlene works very hard to help her children get ahead in life. This is because her husband does not live with them, and the little he provides is not enough to meet the basic household needs. In her business she sells a variety of staple goods, such as cereals, food, cleaning products, etc. She is well-known in the area as a woman who is determined, dedicated and responsible. She does all that is within her power to provide for her household on a daily basis. 

Nancy Marlene has requested this loan from INTEGRAL to invest in her business by buying products for the store (cereals, oil, coffee, pasta, sugar, salt, cleaning products, etc.). This will encourage sales and will lead to an increase in her income. In this way she will be able to continue providing for her home, and fighting for a better quality of life for her and her family.

loans.use: To buy cereals, oil, coffee, pasta, sugar, salt, cleaning products, etc.

loans.name: Reem

texts.en:
Reem is 38 years old, married, and has five children. Reem has a small food store but it is not registered yet. Using the money she earns from her business Reem was able to help her husband enroll her children into school. She was also able to expand her food store by opening a separate store from her house, which is where she is working now.

Reem is requesting a loan, which she will use  to buy more food products and goods for her store and to register it officially to get a license.

loans.use: to purchase food products and goods for her store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy leather, glue, soles and needles.

loans.name: Lidia

texts.es: Lidia, habita en casa de su propiedad junto con sus tres hijos de 23, 14 y 4 años de edad.  Lidia  se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos como: maíz y frijoles. Esta actividad la realiza junto con su hijo mayor de edad. Juntos trabajan para llevar el pan de cada día  a su hogar y tratan de mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia. Ha realizado esta actividad por mucho tiempo y es así como se gana la vida honradamente. Ella es una mujer responsable, honesta y dedicada en su trabajo. Es muy conocida por sus vecinos los cuales dan buenas referencias de su trabajo como de su persona. Cada año repite está actividad ya que es una persona muy humilde y de escasos recursos el cual no puede accesar a otro tipo de negocio o trabajo.  Ella es la que se encarga de la economía del hogar y es el sostén de su familia. Este año al igual que los anteriores ha decidido cultivar la tierra y ya que la temporada de siembra comenzó, solicita esté crédito a INTEGRAL  para realizar la inversión. Comprando insumos agrícolas como: semillas, abonos, insecticidas,  etc. De esta forma espera lograr cultivar los principales granos básicos de este año para poder llevar el pan de cada día a su familia y luchar por una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Lidia lives in her own home with her three children, ages 23, 14 and 4. Lidia grows basic grains like corn and beans. Her oldest son works with her. They work together to put food on the table and to try and improve their family's living conditions. Lidia has worked at this for many years and she makes her living honestly this way. She is a honest, responsible woman and she is dedicated to her work. 

She is well-known by her neighbors, who give great references to her work as well as to her as a person. She grows her crops every year because she is a humble person of limited means and does not have access to any other type of work or business. Lidia is in charge of the household economy and providing for her family. This year, just like every other, she has decided to cultivate her land. Since it is planting season, Lidia is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to invest in the purchase of agricultural supplies like seeds, fertilizer and insecticides. She hopes to keep growing basic grains and to continue providing for her family and fighting for a better life.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and insecticides.

loans.name: Wendy Carolina

texts.es: Wendy Carolina, a sus  25 años de edad tiene una hija, con la cual habita. Como toda mujer visionaria, al no contar con las oportunidades para estudiar, decidió aprender el oficio de cosmetología, lo cual en la actualidad le permite llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar. Posee un salón de belleza el cual es muy conocido en la zona donde vive. Muchas personas confían en el servicio que ella ofrece. En su salón de belleza se ofrece variedad de servicios tales como: cortes, planchados, acrílicos, tintes, etc. posee mucha experiencia en el área lo cual le ha permitido ganarse a muchos clientes. Desea invertir en su negocio en la compra de mercadería y equipo de trabajo para el salón de belleza como: tintes, maquillajes, cremas, plancha, tijeras, etc. el cual le permita atraer a nuevos clientes y por consecuencia le generen un aumento en las ventas e ingresos para continuar llevando el sustento a su hogar y mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Wendy Carolina is 25 years old and lives with her daughter. LIke all visionary women, not having the opportunity to study, Wendy decided to learn how to be a cosmetologist. This is currently how she provides for her family. She has a beauty salon that is quite well-known in the area where she lives. Many people trust the service she provides. She offers a variety of services in her salon like haircuts, flat-ironing, hair-coloring and acrylics. Wendy has a lot of experience which has helped her build a large clientele. She would like to invest in her business by buying merchandise and equipment for her salon: hair-dye, make-up, creams, flat-iron, scissors, etc. This will help her attract new customers, thereby increasing her sales and her income. As a result she will be able to continue supporting her household and improving her and her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy hair-dyes, make-up, creams, scissors, a flat-iron, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To add to her stock of canned goods, snacks, soap, and beverages

loans.name: Rosemary

texts.en:
Rosemary is 38 years old. She has been in the farming business for fourteen years in her home of Nkubu in Central Kenya. Her farm currently produces coffee, bananas, maize and beans, which she sells within the local market. She runs a boutique for additional income. She is married with three children who are aged 16, 14, and 5 years.

Rosemary has requested a loan of 50,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy a water tank at 25,000 KES and irrigation pipes at 25,000 KES. She says an increased farming income will make life better for her family as well as help her educate her children.

She laments the high costs of farming supplies and labor as the major challenges in her farming business.

loans.use: To buy a water tank and irrigation pipes

loans.name: Moisés Elías

texts.es: Moisés Elías tiene 26 años y habita en casa propia junto a su grupo familiar el cual está integrado por su esposa de 25 años y sus dos hijos. Trabaja muy duro para  poder darle  a su familia mejores condiciones de vida a las que en la actualidad tienen. Su esposa colabora con la economía del hogar ya que se dedica a la sastrería y logra percibir ingresos que ayudan a cubrir las necesidades del hogar. El señor Moisés se dedica a la reparación de bicicletas desde hace varios años. Este negocio le permite solventar muchos gastos de su hogar los cuales cada día son mayores. Su deseo es darle estabilidad a su negocio, para poder mantenerlo activo por mucho más tiempo y así continuar llevando el sustento a su hogar. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en capital de trabajo para su negocio ya que desea invertir en repuestos, llantas, neumáticos, agujas, aceites, grasa, etc. para la reparación de las bicicletas. Vale la pena mencionar que es un hombre muy emprendedor y lleno de metas las cuales poco a poco va poniendo en marcha,  con el objetivo de garantizar  estabilidad económica a su familia.
texts.en:
Moisés Elías, age 26, lives in his own house with his family, which is comprised of his 25 year old wife and their two children.  He works very hard in order to be able to give his family better living conditions than they have now.  His wife contributes to the household expenses.  She is a tailor, and she manages to get income that helps to cover the household necessities.

Moisés has been repairing bicycles for several years.  This business allows him to cover a lot of the household expenses, which are more each day.  His wish is to make his business stable in order to be able to keep it active for a long time.  That way he will continue supporting his household.

Therefore, he is requesting this loan from Integral for working capital for his business.  He will use the loan to buy spare parts, rims, tires, air pump needles, lubricant oils, and grease, etc. to repair bicycles.  It is worth mentioning that he is a very enterprising man who is full of goals.  Little by little he is setting the goals in motion with the objective of guaranteeing financial stability for his family.

loans.use: to buy spare parts, rims, tires, air pump needles, lubricant oils, and grease, etc. to repair bicycles.

loans.name: Rosalid

texts.en:
Rosalid is 42 years old and has been in farming for ten years. Currently, she runs her farm with one farmhand and produces maize, bananas and milk for sale to the local market. She also works as support staff at a local hospital. 

She lives with her family of three children, age 18 to 10 years, in their rural home in the Nkubu area of Central Kenya.

Rosalid has requested a loan of 50,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to help her venture into a poultry farming business by buying poultry birds. She says the poultry business has good prospects due to good market prices for both birds and eggs. She says the business will help in paying for her last child's education.

Rosalid says rampant crop failure due to poor rains is the main challenge in farming.

loans.use: To buy poultry birds.

loans.name: Javzandulam

texts.en:
Javzandulam is a 32-year-old married lady who has two daughters and lives with her family in the outer ger district of Ulaanbaatar city, Mongolia, which lacks basic infrastructure. 

Since November, 2011, she has been operating a small grocery store business at the local outer district of the city. 

When she started her business, she bought her small store for 22,000,000  Mongolian Tugriks (MNT). First she paid 14,000,000  MNT and recently she paid the last amount. 

Now she is requesting a 1,500,000 MNT loan to purchase goods to sell.

loans.use: to purchase goods to sell.

loans.name: Edwin

texts.en:
Edwin is 47 years old, married, and has three children who attend school.  He is from the village of Calaocan. His wife manages their hog-raising business. Edwin has been engaged in corn production for almost 10 years. He earned approximately 45,000 Philippine Pesos (PHP) from his last crop. 

Edwin is requesting a loan for 50,000 PHP, which he will use to purchase seed and fertilizer for his corn production. He and his wife work hard to provide for their needs and give their children a good quality of life and send them to school.

loans.use: to purchase seed and fertilizer for his corn production.

loans.name: Sandra Patricia

texts.es: Sandra Patricia  tiene 36 años de edad y habita con su compañero de vida y sus hijos. Ella se dedica a la venta de detergente y papel higiénico. La venta la realiza de manera ambulante en las diferentes áreas de la zona donde habita. Tiene muchos años de dedicarse a esta actividad por lo que ya tiene mucha experiencia en el área. Esto le ha permitido ganarse la confianza de muchos clientes los cuales cada día la prefieren más.  La señora Sandra es muy trabajadora, emprendedora, luchadora y muy amable. Trabaja muy duro para colaborar con la economía del hogar, ya que la situación económica es muy difícil y muchas veces no logra cubrir las principales necesidades de su familia. Con mucho entusiasmo se acerco a esta institución, INTEGRAL, para solicitar credito, con el cual desea invertir en la compra de detergentes y papel higiénico al por mayor. Con el fin de impulsar las ventas,  para que generen mayores ganancias que permitan mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Sandra Patricia is 36 years old and she lives with her partner and her children. She works selling detergent and toilet paper. She sells them on foot throughout the different areas in the zone where she lives. She's been selling these items for many years and has a lot of experience. This has helped Sandra win her customers' trust and every day more and more choose her. 

Sandra is very hard-working, entrepreneurial and friendly. She works very hard to contribute to the household economy because her economic situation is very difficult and often the money doesn't go far enough to meet her family's basic needs. She was very excited to request a loan from INTEGRAL, which she would like to invest in buying detergent and toilet paper in bulk. Sandra hopes to increase sales and generate more income which will allow her to improve her and her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy detergents and toilet paper in bulk.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, soap and beverages.

loans.name: Alice

texts.en:
Alice is a mother of two children, age 10 and 5 years, and she has been actively farming for 15 years in her rural home area. She sells her farm products of maize, milk and beans to the local market. She also has a cereals retail business in the local market to supplement her farming income.

Alice has requested a loan of 40,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy a water tank and irrigation pipes. She hopes setting up an irrigation system will improve her farming income and help her in paying for the education of her two children.

Alice says the main challenge in farming is the unreliable rains, but she is optimistic that she can meet this challenge.

loans.use: To buy a water tank and pipes for irrigation.

loans.name: Edith Elizabeth

texts.es: Edith Elizabeth de 45 años de edad, habita junto con sus hijos en casa de su propiedad. Ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de deliciosas tortillas. Todos los días se levanta muy temprano para poder  preparar los ingredientes necesarios para la elaboración de las deliciosas tortillas que tanto demandan sus clientes. El negocio está ubicado en su hogar de habitación. Eventualmente, también vende ropa. Es una mujer emprendedora la cual hace todo lo que esté en sus manos para llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar.  Desea ver a sus hijos en mejores condiciones a las que por el momento poseen, esto le da fuerza a seguir trabajando para algún día poder cumplir su sueño. Tiene muchos clientes fijos que la prefieren por ser una mujer higiénica, responsable, trabajadora y emprendedora.  Es bien conocida en la zona donde habita ya que es muy amable y siempre atiende su negocio con una sonrisa lo que les da confianza a los clientes y se motivan a querer regresar. Solicita esté crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su tortillería en la compra de la materia prima necesaria (maíz, gas propano, cal, etc.) para la elaboración de las deliciosas  tortillas. Espera obtener resultados favorables lo cual le permita incrementar sus ventas y ganancias que le lleven a mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Edith Elizabeth is 45 years old and she lives with her children in her own home. She works making and selling delicious tortillas. Every day she gets up very early to prepare the ingredients necessary to make the delicious tortillas that her customers demand. Her business is located in her home. Edith sells clothes as well. She is an entrepreneurial woman who does everything available to her in order to put food on the table. She would like to see her children living in better conditions than they are currently in, and this motivates her to continue working in order to achieve her dream one day. 

Edith Elizabeth has many regular customers who choose her because she is hygienic, responsible and hard-working. She is well-known in the area where she lives and is very friendly, always running her business with a smile. This makes her customers feel good and gives them a reason to come back. She is requesting this loan from INTEGRAL to buy raw materials for her tortilla business (corn, lime, propane gas). She hopes to increase her sales and her earnings and provide a better quality of life for herself and her family.

loans.use: to buy corn, lime and propane gas.

loans.name: Francis

texts.en:
Francis has been in farming for ten years, producing milk, maize and beans, which he sells locally. He is married and has three children between 15 and 7 years old. He also works as a welder in the local market.

Francis has requested a loan of 40,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy dairy goats. He says dairy cows have been very vulnerable to inadequate rains and diseases, but dairy goats will be more resistant to such challenges besides producing more nutritious milk. He plans to venture into fish farming in the future. He adds that the farming income will help him in educating his children.

Francis says Juhudi Kilimo financial services have been a great blessing to smallholder farmers.

loans.use: To buy dairy goats.

loans.name: Nelson Isai

texts.es: Nelson Isai de 35 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su grupo familiar el cual está formado por su esposa e hijos. Él se dedica al cultivo de maíz. Cada año cultiva cuatro manzanas de tierra, las cuales alquila. Junto con uno de sus hijos trabajan duramente para poder llevar el sustento a su familia. Gracias a los conocimientos que posee en la agricultura, es como logra mantener a su familia ya que  es su  principal fuente de ingresos para él y para su familia. Además, vele la pena mencionar que habita en condiciones muy humildes y sencillas. Sus sencillas condiciones no lo limitan a luchar por una calidad de vida diferente sino contrariamente lo motivan. Es un hombre emprendedor él cual siempre está buscando la forma de generar ingresos para ayudar a su familia con los gastos del hogar. Solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL, debido a que la temporada para la siembra ya inicio y necesita invertir en la compra de los insumos necesarios (insecticidas, semillas, abonos, etc.) para la siembra, ya que son indispensables, para obtener una cosecha abundante. De esta forma desea seguir ganándose el pan de cada día y buscar la forma de ir mejorando su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Nelson Isai is 35 years old and lives in his own home with his wife and children. He grows corn. Every year he farms four acres of land, which he rents. He and one of his sons work very hard in order to provide for their family. Thanks to his agricultural knowledge, Nelson is able to provide for his family with this work. It is their principal source of income. He and his family live in very humble, simple conditions. These conditions don't prevent Nelson from fighting for a better quality of life. Instead, they motivate him. 

Nelson is an entrepreneurial man and he is always looking for ways to earn money to help his family and cover their household expenses. He is requesting this loan from INTEGRAL because it is planting season and he needs to invest in the materials (insecticides, seeds, fertilizer, etc) he needs in order to ensure an abundant harvest. Nelson wants to keep providing for his family this way and find a way to improve the quality of their lives.

loans.use: to buy insecticides, seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Wilmer

texts.es: Wilmer  tiene 31 años de edad y habita junto a su grupo familiar el cual está integrado por su compañera de vida la cual es ama de casa y sus dos hijos menores de edad, los cuales estudian en la zona. Él se dedica a la venta y crianza de pollos de engorde y cerdos de clase. Posee mucha experiencia en esta actividad, por lo que ya posee clientes fijos, los cuales le demandan sus animales cuando están en las condiciones adecuadas para la comercialización. Sus clientes y vecinos dan buenas referencias de él y de su trabajo ya que  siempre trata de mantenerlos satisfechos para que siempre estén motivados a regresar y continuar demandando sus animales. Habita en condiciones muy sencillas y humildes junto a su familia, esto lo motiva a continuar trabajando con más ganas para llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar. Como todo hombre emprendedor con deseos de superarse ha tomado la decisión de solicitar esté crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de cerdos de clase y pollos de engorde. Con el fin de dar un impulso a su negocio que le permita incrementar las ventas y sus ingresos, como consecuencia espera mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Wilmer, age 31, lives with his family, which is comprised of his life partner, who is a housewife, and their two minor children.  The children attend school in the area.

He raises chickens and pigs that have been bred to fatten and sell.  He has a lot of experience in this business activity.  Therefore, he has fixed customers, and his animals are in demand when they have reached an adequate growth to be sold.

His customers and neighbors give him and his work good references.  He always tries to keep them satisfied so that they are always motivated to return and continue buying his animals.  

He lives in very simple and humble conditions with his family.  This motivates him to be even more eager to continue working in order to bring home the daily bread. 

Like all enterprising men, he wishes to improve himself.  He has made the decision to request this loan from Integral to buy pigs that have been bred and chickens to fatten.  He will do this to give his business a boost.  This will allow him to increase his sales and his income.  As a consequence, he hopes to improve his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy pigs that have been bred and chickens to fatten.

loans.name: Josiah

texts.en:
Josiah is a father of one adult son, age 26 years. Josiah has been in active farming for 20 years in his rural home in Nkubu, Central Kenya. His farm produce, which includes coffee, maize, beans and milk, is sold to the local markets. He runs a butchery business besides farming.

Josiah has made a loan request of 50,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to build a zero-grazing unit for his dairy animals. He says the zero-grazing unit will help him manage his feeds, especially for the dry seasons when feeds become scarce and expensive. He plans to use his farming income to purchase more parcels of land for his farming business to earn better income.

Josiah says lack of sufficient rains and the effects of pests are the major challenges. He is glad for the services of Juhudi Kilimo, which he says are helping in eradicating poverty.

loans.use: To construct a zero grazing unit.

loans.name: Felimon

texts.en:
Felimon is 57 years old. He has been engaged in the farming business for over 25 years. He lives with his wife and three children. 

He wants to further develop his business in order to continue to live a comfortable life. In order to do this, he is asking for a loan in the amount of PHP 20,000 to purchase seed, fertilizer and pesticides for use in his business. 

With the help of these inputs he hopes to improve his farm and yield more productive harvests.

loans.use: to purchase seed, fertilizer and pesticide for use in his business.

loans.name: Dominic

texts.en:
Dominic is a farmer in Murang’a in Central Kenya where he has been farming for twenty years and currently runs his farm with the help of one farmhand, producing and selling milk and French peas.

Dominic has requested a loan of 50,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy a chaff cutter to help in easy feeding of his dairy animals. He adds the equipment will help reduce the waste on dairy feed. He plans to buy more dairy cows in the near future.

Dominic says instability in the market, especially for milk, with fluctuation in prices remains a serious challenge.

loans.use: To buy a chaff cutter (to cut fodder)

loans.name: Rolando

texts.en:
Rolando is 55 years old, and he operates a farming business in his village. He lives a simple life with his wife and four children. Every day, he goes into the field and spends all of his time working. Despite the difficulties of farming, he has the courage to persist in earning his family's income.
